anya-e0102n8:2: 692. Ayaṁ maggo, ayaṁ na maggoti evaṁ maggañca amaggañca ñatvā ṭhitaṁ ñāṇaṁ pana maggāmaggañāṇadassanavisuddhi nāma.
anya-e0102n8:3_0: Taṁ sampādetukāmena kalāpasammasanasaṅkhātāya nayavipassanāya tāva yogo karaṇīyo.
anya-e0102n8:3_2: hi obhāsādīsu sambhūtesu maggāmaggañāṇaṁ hoti, vipassanāya ca kalāpasammasanaṁ ādi.
anya-e0102n8:3_3: Tasmā etaṁ kaṅkhāvitaraṇānantaraṁ uddiṭṭhaṁ. Apica yasmā tīraṇapariññāya vattamānāya
anya-e0102n8:3_4: maggāmaggañāṇaṁ uppajjati, tīraṇapariññā ca ñātapariññānantarā, tasmāpi taṁ maggāmaggañāṇadassanavisuddhiṁ
anya-e0102n8:4_0: 693. Tatrāyaṁ vinicchayo – tisso hi lokiyapariññā ñātapariññā tīraṇapariññā pahānapariññā
anya-e0102n8:4_1: ca. Yā sandhāya vuttaṁ “abhiññāpaññā ñātaṭṭhe ñāṇaṁ. Pariññāpaññā tīraṇaṭṭhe ñāṇaṁ.
anya-e0102n8:4_2: Pahānapaññā pariccāgaṭṭhe ñāṇa”nti. Tattha “ruppanalakkhaṇaṁ rūpaṁ, vedayitalakkhaṇā
anya-e0102n8:4_3: vedanā”ti evaṁ tesaṁ tesaṁ dhammānaṁ paccattalakkhaṇasallakkhaṇavasena pavattā paññā
anya-e0102n8:4_4: ñātapariññā nāma. “Rūpaṁ aniccaṁ, vedanā aniccā”tiādinā nayena tesaṁyeva dhammānaṁ
anya-e0102n8:4_5: sāmaññalakkhaṇaṁ āropetvā pavattā lakkhaṇārammaṇikavipassanā paññā tīraṇapariññā
anya-e0102n8:4_6: nāma. Tesuyeva pana dhammesu niccasaññādipajahanavasena pavattā lakkhaṇārammaṇikavipassanā
anya-e0102n8:5_0: Tattha saṅkhāraparicchedato paṭṭhāya yāva paccayapariggahā ñātapariññāya bhūmi. Etasmiṁ
anya-e0102n8:5_1: hi antare dhammānaṁ paccattalakkhaṇapaṭivedhasseva ādhipaccaṁ hoti. Kalāpasammasanato
anya-e0102n8:5_2: pana paṭṭhāya yāva udayabbayānupassanā tīraṇapariññāya bhūmi. Etasmiṁ hi antare sāmaññalakkhaṇapaṭivedhasseva
anya-e0102n8:5_3: ādhipaccaṁ hoti. Bhaṅgānupassanaṁ ādiṁ katvā upari pahānapariññāya bhūmi. Tato paṭṭhāya
anya-e0102n8:5_4: hi aniccato anupassanto niccasaññaṁ pajahati, dukkhato anupassanto sukhasaññaṁ, anattato
anya-e0102n8:5_5: anupassanto attasaññaṁ, nibbindanto nandiṁ, virajjanto rāgaṁ, nirodhento samudayaṁ,
anya-e0102n8:5_6: paṭinissajjanto ādānaṁ pajahatīti evaṁ niccasaññādipahānasādhikānaṁ sattannaṁ anupassanānaṁ
anya-e0102n8:5_7: ādhipaccaṁ. Iti imāsu tīsu pariññāsu saṅkhāraparicchedassa ceva paccayapariggahassa
anya-e0102n8:5_8: ca sādhitattā iminā yoginā ñātapariññāva adhigatā hoti, itarā ca adhigantabbā. Tena
anya-e0102n8:5_9: vuttaṁ “yasmā tīraṇapariññāya vattamānāya maggāmaggañāṇaṁ uppajjati, tīraṇapariññā
anya-e0102n8:5_10: ca ñātapariññānantarā, tasmāpi taṁ maggāmaggañāṇadassanavisuddhiṁ sampādetukāmena
anya-e0102n8:7_0: “Kathaṁ atītānāgatapaccuppannānaṁ dhammānaṁ saṅkhipitvā vavatthāne paññā sammasane
anya-e0102n8:7_1: ñāṇaṁ? Yaṁkiñci rūpaṁ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṁ ajjhattaṁ vā…pe… yaṁ dūre santike vā,

anya-e0102n8:7_3: sammasanaṁ. Anattato vavatthapeti, ekaṁ sammasanaṁ. Yā kāci vedanā…pe… yaṁkiñci viññāṇaṁ…pe…
anya-e0102n8:8: “Cakkhuṁ…pe… jarāmaraṇaṁ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṁ aniccato vavatthapeti, ekaṁ sammasanaṁ. Dukkhato anattato vavatthapeti, ekaṁ sammasanaṁ.
anya-e0102n8:9_0: “Rūpaṁ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṁ aniccaṁ khayaṭṭhena, dukkhaṁ bhayaṭṭhena, anattā asārakaṭṭhenāti
anya-e0102n8:9_1: saṅkhipitvā vavatthāne paññā sammasane ñāṇaṁ. Vedanaṁ… viññāṇaṁ… cakkhuṁ…pe… jarāmaraṇaṁ…pe… sammasane ñāṇaṁ.
anya-e0102n8:10_1: vayadhammaṁ virāgadhammaṁ nirodhadhammanti saṅkhipitvā vavatthāne paññā sammasane
anya-e0102n8:10_2: ñāṇaṁ. Vedanaṁ… viññāṇaṁ… cakkhuṁ… jarāmaraṇaṁ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṁ aniccaṁ saṅkhataṁ…pe…
anya-e0102n8:10_3: nirodhadhammanti saṅkhipitvā vavatthāne paññā sammasane ñāṇaṁ.
anya-e0102n8:11_0: “Jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇaṁ, asati jātiyā natthi jarāmaraṇanti saṅkhipitvā vavatthāne
anya-e0102n8:11_1: paññā sammasane ñāṇaṁ. Atītampi addhānaṁ, anāgatampi addhānaṁ jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇaṁ,
anya-e0102n8:11_2: asati jātiyā natthi jarāmaraṇanti saṅkhipitvā vavatthāne paññā sammasane ñāṇaṁ. Bhavapaccayā
anya-e0102n8:11_3: jāti…pe… avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā, asati avijjāya natthi saṅkhārāti saṅkhipitvā vavatthāne
anya-e0102n8:11_4: paññā sammasane ñāṇaṁ. Atītampi addhānaṁ, anāgatampi addhānaṁ avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā,
anya-e0102n8:11_5: asati avijjāya natthi saṅkhārāti saṅkhipitvā vavatthāne paññā sammasane ñāṇaṁ.
anya-e0102n8:12: “Taṁ ñātaṭṭhena ñāṇaṁ. Pajānanaṭṭhena paññā. Tena vuccati atītānāgatapaccuppannānaṁ dhammānaṁ saṅkhipitvā vavatthāne paññā sammasane ñāṇa”nti.
anya-e0102n8:13_0: Ettha ca cakkhuṁ…pe… jarāmaraṇanti iminā peyyālena dvārārammaṇehi saddhiṁ dvārappavattā
anya-e0102n8:13_1: dhammā, pañcakkhandhā, cha dvārāni, cha ārammaṇāni, cha viññāṇāni, cha phassā, cha
anya-e0102n8:13_2: vedanā, cha saññā, cha cetanā, cha taṇhā, cha vitakkā, cha vicārā, cha dhātuyo, dasa
anya-e0102n8:13_3: kasiṇāni, dvattiṁsakoṭṭhāsā, dvādasāyatanāni, aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo, bāvīsati indriyāni,
anya-e0102n8:13_4: tisso dhātuyo, nava bhavā, cattāri jhānāni, catasso appamaññā, catasso samāpattiyo,
anya-e0102n8:13_5: dvādasa paṭiccasamuppādaṅgānīti ime dhammarāsayo saṁkhittāti veditabbā.
anya-e0102n8:15_0: “Sabbaṁ, bhikkhave, abhiññeyyaṁ. Kiñca, bhikkhave, sabbaṁ abhiññeyyaṁ? Cakkhu, bhikkhave,
anya-e0102n8:15_1: abhiññeyyaṁ. Rūpā… cakkhuviññāṇaṁ… cakkhusamphasso… yampidaṁ cakkhusamphassapaccayā
anya-e0102n8:15_2: uppajjati vedayitaṁ sukhaṁ vā dukkhaṁ vā adukkhamasukhaṁ vā, tampi abhiññeyyaṁ. Sotaṁ…pe…
anya-e0102n8:15_3: yampidaṁ manosamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṁ sukhaṁ vā dukkhaṁ vā adukkhamasukhaṁ
anya-e0102n8:16: “Rūpaṁ…pe… viññāṇaṁ… cakkhu…pe… mano… rūpā…pe… dhammā… cakkhuviññāṇaṁ…pe… manoviññāṇaṁ… cakkhusamphasso…pe… manosamphasso….
anya-e0102n8:17_1: rūpasañcetanā…pe… dhammasañcetanā… rūpataṇhā…pe… dhammataṇhā… rūpavitakko…pe… dhammavitakko…
anya-e0102n8:18: “Pathavīdhātu…pe… viññāṇadhātu… pathavīkasiṇaṁ…pe… viññāṇakasiṇaṁ… kesā…pe… muttaṁ… matthaluṅgaṁ….
anya-e0102n8:19: “Cakkhāyatanaṁ…pe… dhammāyatanaṁ… cakkhudhātu…pe… manodhātu… manoviññāṇadhātu… cakkhundriyaṁ…pe… aññātāvindriyaṁ….
anya-e0102n8:20: “Kāmadhātu… rūpadhātu… arūpadhātu… kāmabhavo… rūpabhavo… arūpabhavo… saññābhavo… asaññābhavo… nevasaññānāsaññābhavo… ekavokārabhavo… catuvokārabhavo… pañcavokārabhavo….
anya-e0102n8:21_0: “Paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ…pe… catutthaṁ jhānaṁ… mettācetovimutti…pe… upekkhācetovimutti… ākāsānañcāyatanasamāpatti…pe…
anya-e0102n8:22_0: Taṁ tattha evaṁ vitthārena vuttattā idha sabbaṁ peyyālena saṁkhittaṁ. Evaṁ saṁkhitte
anya-e0102n8:22_1: panettha ye lokuttarā dhammā āgatā, te asammasanupagattā imasmiṁ adhikāre na gahetabbā.
anya-e0102n8:22_2: Yepi ca sammasanupagā, tesu ye yassa pākaṭā honti sukhena pariggahaṁ gacchanti, tesu
anya-e0102n8:23_0: 695. Tatrāyaṁ khandhavasena ārabbhavidhānayojanā – yaṁkiñci rūpaṁ…pe… sabbaṁ rūpaṁ
anya-e0102n8:23_1: aniccato vavatthapeti, ekaṁ sammasanaṁ. Dukkhato anattato vavatthapeti, ekaṁ sammasananti.
anya-e0102n8:23_2: Ettāvatā ayaṁ bhikkhu “yaṁkiñci rūpa”nti evaṁ aniyamaniddiṭṭhaṁ sabbampi rūpaṁ atītattikena
anya-e0102n8:23_3: ceva catūhi ca ajjhattādidukehīti ekādasahi okāsehi paricchinditvā sabbaṁ rūpaṁ aniccato
anya-e0102n8:24: Kathaṁ ? Parato vuttanayena. Vuttañhetaṁ – “rūpaṁ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṁ aniccaṁ khayaṭṭhenā”ti.
anya-e0102n8:25: Tasmā esa yaṁ atītaṁ rūpaṁ, taṁ yasmā atīteyeva khīṇaṁ, nayimaṁ bhavaṁ sampattanti aniccaṁ khayaṭṭhena.
anya-e0102n8:26: Yaṁ anāgataṁ anantarabhave nibbattissati, tampi tattheva khīyissati, na tato paraṁ bhavaṁ gamissatīti aniccaṁ khayaṭṭhena.
anya-e0102n8:27: Yaṁ paccuppannaṁ rūpaṁ, tampi idheva khīyati, na ito gacchatīti aniccaṁ khayaṭṭhena.
anya-e0102n8:28: Yaṁ ajjhattaṁ, tampi ajjhattameva khīyati, na bahiddhābhāvaṁ gacchatīti aniccaṁ khayaṭṭhena.
anya-e0102n8:29: Yaṁ bahiddhā…pe… oḷārikaṁ…pe… sukhumaṁ…pe… hīnaṁ…pe… paṇītaṁ…pe… dūre…pe… santike, tampi tattheva khīyati, na dūrabhāvaṁ gacchatīti aniccaṁ khayaṭṭhenāti sammasati.
anya-e0102n8:30: Idaṁ sabbampi “aniccaṁ khayaṭṭhenā”ti etassa vasena ekaṁ sammasanaṁ. Bhedato pana ekādasavidhaṁ hoti.
anya-e0102n8:31_0: Sabbameva ca taṁ dukkhaṁ bhayaṭṭhena. Bhayaṭṭhenāti sappaṭibhayatāya. Yañhi aniccaṁ,
anya-e0102n8:31_1: taṁ bhayāvahaṁ hoti sīhopamasutte devānaṁ viya. Iti idampi “dukkhaṁ bhayaṭṭhenā”ti
anya-e0102n8:31_2: etassa vasena ekaṁ sammasanaṁ. Bhedato pana ekādasavidhaṁ hoti.
anya-e0102n8:32_0: Yathā ca dukkhaṁ, evaṁ sabbampi taṁ anattā asārakaṭṭhena. Asārakaṭṭhenāti “attā nivāsī
anya-e0102n8:32_1: kārako vedako sayaṁvasī”ti evaṁ parikappitassa attasārassa abhāvena. Yañhi aniccaṁ,
anya-e0102n8:32_2: dukkhaṁ, taṁ attanopi aniccataṁ vā udayabbayapīḷanaṁ vā vāretuṁ na sakkoti, kuto
anya-e0102n8:32_3: tassa kārakādibhāvo. Tenāha – “rūpañca hidaṁ, bhikkhave, attā abhavissa. Nayidaṁ
anya-e0102n8:32_4: rūpaṁ ābādhāya saṁvatteyyā”tiādi. Iti idampi “anattā asārakaṭṭhenā”ti etassa vasena
anya-e0102n8:32_5: ekaṁ sammasanaṁ. Bhedato pana ekādasavidhaṁ hoti. Esa nayo vedanādīsu.
anya-e0102n8:33_0: 696. Yaṁ pana aniccaṁ, taṁ yasmā niyamato saṅkhatādibhedaṁ hoti. Tenassa pariyāyadassanatthaṁ,
anya-e0102n8:33_2: saṅkhataṁ paṭiccasamuppannaṁ khayadhammaṁ vayadhammaṁ virāgadhammaṁ nirodhadhamma”nti
anya-e0102n8:33_3: puna pāḷi vuttā. Esa nayo vedanādīsūti.
anya-e0102n8:35_0: 697. So tasseva pañcasu khandhesu aniccadukkhānattasammasanassa thirabhāvatthāya,
anya-e0102n8:35_1: yaṁ taṁ bhagavatā “katamehi cattārīsāya ākārehi anulomikaṁ khantiṁ paṭilabhati, katamehi
anya-e0102n8:35_2: cattārīsāya ākārehi sammattaniyāmaṁ okkamatī”ti etassa vibhaṅge –
anya-e0102n8:36_0: “Pañcakkhandhe aniccato, dukkhato, rogato, gaṇḍato, sallato, aghato, ābādhato, parato,
anya-e0102n8:36_1: palokato, ītito, upaddavato, bhayato, upasaggato, calato, pabhaṅguto, addhuvato,
anya-e0102n8:36_2: atāṇato, aleṇato, asaraṇato, rittato, tucchato, suññato, anattato, ādīnavato, vipariṇāmadhammato,
anya-e0102n8:36_3: asārakato, aghamūlato, vadhakato, vibhavato, sāsavato, saṅkhatato, mārāmisato, jātidhammato,
anya-e0102n8:36_4: jarādhammato, byādhidhammato, maraṇadhammato, sokadhammato, paridevadhammato, upāyāsadhammato,
anya-e0102n8:38: “Pañcakkhandhe aniccato passanto anulomikaṁ khantiṁ paṭilabhati. Pañcannaṁ khandhānaṁ nirodho niccaṁ nibbānanti passanto sammattaniyāmaṁ okkamatī”tiādinā nayena,
anya-e0102n8:39: Anulomañāṇaṁ vibhajantena pabhedato aniccādisammasanaṁ vuttaṁ. Tassāpi vasena ime pañcakkhandhe sammasati.
anya-e0102n8:40_0: 698. Kathaṁ ? So hi ekekaṁ khandhaṁ anaccantikatāya, ādiantavantatāya ca aniccato.
anya-e0102n8:40_1: Uppādavayapaṭipīḷanatāya, dukkhavatthutāya ca dukkhato. Paccayayāpanīyatāya, rogamūlatāya
anya-e0102n8:40_2: ca rogato. Dukkhatāsūlayogitāya, kilesāsucipaggharaṇatāya, uppādajarābhaṅgehi uddhumātaparipakkapabhinnatāya
anya-e0102n8:40_3: ca gaṇḍato. Pīḷājanakatāya, antotudanatāya, dunnīharaṇīyatāya ca sallato. Vigarahaṇīyatāya,
anya-e0102n8:40_4: avaḍḍhiāvahanatāya, aghavatthutāya ca aghato. Aseribhāvajanakatāya, ābādhapadaṭṭhānatāya
anya-e0102n8:40_5: ca ābādhato. Avasatāya, avidheyyatāya ca parato. Byādhijarāmaraṇehi palujjanatāya
anya-e0102n8:40_6: palokato. Anekabyasanāvahanatāya ītito. Aviditānaṁyeva vipulānaṁ anatthānaṁ āvahanato,
anya-e0102n8:40_7: sabbupaddavavatthutāya ca upaddavato. Sabbabhayānaṁ ākaratāya, dukkhavūpasamasaṅkhātassa
anya-e0102n8:40_8: paramassāsassa paṭipakkhabhūtatāya ca bhayato. Anekehi anatthehi anubaddhatāya, dosūpasaṭṭhatāya,
anya-e0102n8:40_9: upasaggo viya anadhivāsanārahatāya ca upasaggato. Byādhijarāmaraṇehi ceva lābhālābhādīhi
anya-e0102n8:40_10: ca lokadhammehi pacalitatāya calato. Upakkamena ceva sarasena ca pabhaṅgupagamanasīlatāya
anya-e0102n8:40_11: pabhaṅguto. Sabbāvatthanipātitāya, thirabhāvassa ca abhāvatāya addhuvato. Atāyanatāya
anya-e0102n8:40_12: ceva, alabbhaneyyakhematāya ca atāṇato. Allīyituṁ anarahatāya, allīnānampi ca leṇakiccākāritāya
anya-e0102n8:40_13: aleṇato. Nissitānaṁ bhayasārakattābhāvena asaraṇato. Yathāparikappitehi dhuvasubhasukhattabhāvehi
anya-e0102n8:40_14: rittatāya rittato. Rittatāyeva tucchato appakattā vā, appakampi hi loke tucchanti
anya-e0102n8:40_16: anattato. Pavattidukkhatāya, dukkhassa ca ādīnavatāya ādīnavato, atha vā ādīnaṁ vāti
anya-e0102n8:40_17: gacchati pavattatīti ādīnavo, kapaṇamanussassetaṁ adhivacanaṁ, khandhāpi ca kapaṇāyevāti
anya-e0102n8:40_18: ādīnavasadisatāya ādīnavato. Jarāya ceva maraṇena cāti dvedhā pariṇāmapakatitāya
anya-e0102n8:40_19: vipariṇāmadhammato. Dubbalatāya, pheggu viya sukhabhañjanīyatāya ca asārakato. Aghahetutāya
anya-e0102n8:40_20: aghamūlato. Mittamukhasapatto viya vissāsaghātitāya vadhakato. Vigatabhavatāya, vibhavasambhūtatāya
anya-e0102n8:40_21: ca vibhavato. Āsavapadaṭṭhānatāya sāsavato. Hetupaccayehi abhisaṅkhatatāya saṅkhatato.
anya-e0102n8:41_0: Ettha hi aniccato, palokato, calato, pabhaṅguto, addhuvato, vipariṇāmadhammato, asārakato,
anya-e0102n8:41_1: vibhavato, saṅkhatato, maraṇadhammatoti ekekasmiṁ khandhe dasa dasa katvā paññāsa
anya-e0102n8:41_2: aniccānupassanāni. Parato, rittato, tucchato, suññato, anattatoti ekekasmiṁ khandhe
anya-e0102n8:41_3: pañca pañca katvā pañcavīsati anattānupassanāni. Sesāni dukkhato, rogatotiādīni ekekasmiṁ
anya-e0102n8:41_4: khandhe pañcavīsati pañcavīsati katvā pañcavīsatisataṁ dukkhānupassanānīti.
anya-e0102n8:42_0: Iccassa iminā dvisatabhedena aniccādisammasanena pañcakkhandhe sammasato taṁ nayavipassanāsaṅkhātaṁ
anya-e0102n8:42_1: aniccadukkhānattasammasanaṁ thiraṁ hoti. Idaṁ tāvettha pāḷinayānusārena sammasanārambhavidhānaṁ.
anya-e0102n8:44_0: 699. Yassa pana evaṁ nayavipassanāya yogaṁ karotopi nayavipassanā na sampajjati,
anya-e0102n8:44_1: tena “navahākārehi indriyāni tikkhāni bhavanti – uppannuppannānaṁ saṅkhārānaṁ khayameva
anya-e0102n8:44_2: passati, tattha ca sakkaccakiriyāya sampādeti, sātaccakiriyāya sampādeti, sappāyakiriyāya
anya-e0102n8:44_3: sampādeti, samādhissa ca nimittaggāhena, bojjhaṅgānañca anupavattanatāya, kāye ca
anya-e0102n8:44_4: jīvite ca anapekkhataṁ upaṭṭhāpeti, tattha ca abhibhuyya nekkhammena, antarā ca abyosānenā”ti
anya-e0102n8:44_5: evaṁ vuttānaṁ navannaṁ ākārānaṁ vasena indriyāni tikkhāni katvā pathavīkasiṇaniddese
anya-e0102n8:44_6: vuttanayena satta asappāyāni vajjetvā satta sappāyāni sevamānena kālena rūpaṁ sammasitabbaṁ,
anya-e0102n8:44_7: kālena arūpaṁ. Rūpaṁ sammasantena rūpassa nibbatti passitabbā.
anya-e0102n8:46_0: 700. Seyyathidaṁ – idaṁ rūpaṁ nāma kammādivasena catūhi kāraṇehi nibbattati. Tattha
anya-e0102n8:46_1: sabbesaṁ sattānaṁ rūpaṁ nibbattamānaṁ paṭhamaṁ kammato nibbattati. Paṭisandhikkhaṇeyeva
anya-e0102n8:46_2: hi gabbhaseyyakānaṁ tāva tisantativasena vatthu-kāya-bhāvadasakasaṅkhātāni tiṁsa
anya-e0102n8:46_3: rūpāni nibbattanti, tāni ca kho paṭisandhicittassa uppādakkhaṇeyeva. Yathā ca uppādakkhaṇe,
anya-e0102n8:47_0: Tattha rūpaṁ dandhanirodhaṁ garuparivatti, cittaṁ khippanirodhaṁ lahuparivatti. Tenāha
anya-e0102n8:47_1: – “nāhaṁ, bhikkhave, aññaṁ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi, yaṁ evaṁ lahuparivattaṁ yathayidaṁ,
anya-e0102n8:47_2: bhikkhave, citta”nti. Rūpe dharanteyeva hi soḷasavāre bhavaṅgacittaṁ uppajjitvā nirujjhati.
anya-e0102n8:47_3: Cittassa uppādakkhaṇopi ṭhitikkhaṇopi bhaṅgakkhaṇopi ekasadisā. Rūpassa pana uppādabhaṅgakkhaṇāyeva
anya-e0102n8:47_4: lahukā, tehi sadisā. Ṭhitikkhaṇo pana mahā, yāva soḷasa cittāni uppajjitvā nirujjhanti,
anya-e0102n8:47_5: tāva vattati. Paṭisandhicittassa uppādakkhaṇe uppannaṁ ṭhānappattaṁ purejātaṁ vatthuṁ
anya-e0102n8:47_6: nissāya dutiyaṁ bhavaṅgaṁ uppajjati. Tena saddhiṁ uppannaṁ ṭhānappattaṁ purejātaṁ
anya-e0102n8:47_7: vatthuṁ nissāya tatiyaṁ bhavaṅgaṁ uppajjati. Iminā nayena yāvatāyukaṁ cittappavatti
anya-e0102n8:47_8: veditabbā. Āsannamaraṇassa pana ekameva ṭhānappattaṁ purejātaṁ vatthuṁ nissāya soḷasa cittāni uppajjanti.
anya-e0102n8:48_0: Paṭisandhicittassa uppādakkhaṇe uppannaṁ rūpaṁ paṭisandhicittato uddhaṁ soḷasamena
anya-e0102n8:48_1: cittena saddhiṁ nirujjhati. Ṭhānakkhaṇe uppannaṁ sattarasamassa uppādakkhaṇena saddhiṁ
anya-e0102n8:48_2: nirujjhati. Bhaṅgakkhaṇe uppannaṁ sattarasamassa ṭhānakkhaṇaṁ patvā nirujjhati. Yāva
anya-e0102n8:48_3: pavatti nāma atthi, evameva pavattati. Opapātikānampi sattasantativasena sattati
anya-e0102n8:49_2: Tattha kammaṁ nāma kusalākusalacetanā. Kammasamuṭṭhānaṁ nāma vipākakkhandhā ca, cakkhudasakādi
anya-e0102n8:49_3: samasattatirūpañca. Kammapaccayaṁ nāma tadeva, kammaṁ hi kammasamuṭṭhānassa upatthambhakapaccayopi
anya-e0102n8:49_4: hoti. Kammapaccayacittasamuṭṭhānaṁ nāma vipākacittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ. Kammapaccayaāhārasamuṭṭhānaṁ
anya-e0102n8:49_5: nāma kammasamuṭṭhānarūpesu ṭhānappattā ojā aññaṁ ojaṭṭhamakaṁ samuṭṭhāpeti, tatrāpi
anya-e0102n8:49_6: ojā ṭhānaṁ patvā aññanti evaṁ catasso vā pañca vā pavattiyo ghaṭeti. Kammapaccayautusamuṭṭhānaṁ
anya-e0102n8:49_7: nāma kammajatejodhātu ṭhānappattā utusamuṭṭhānaṁ ojaṭṭhamakaṁ samuṭṭhāpeti, tatrāpi
anya-e0102n8:49_8: utu aññaṁ ojaṭṭhamakanti evaṁ catasso vā pañca vā pavattiyo ghaṭeti. Evaṁ tāva kammajarūpassa
anya-e0102n8:50: 702. Cittajesupi cittaṁ, cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ, cittapaccayaṁ, cittapaccayaāhārasamuṭṭhānaṁ, cittapaccayautusamuṭṭhānanti esa vibhāgo veditabbo. Tattha cittaṁ nāma ekūnanavuticittāni.
anya-e0102n8:53_0: Kāmāvacarato hi aṭṭha kusalāni, dvādasākusalāni, manodhātuvajjā dasa kiriyā, kusalakiriyato
anya-e0102n8:53_1: dve abhiññācittānīti dvattiṁsa cittāni rūpaṁ, iriyāpathaṁ, viññattiñca janenti. Vipākavajjāni
anya-e0102n8:53_2: sesadasarūpāvacarāni, aṭṭha arūpāvacarāni, aṭṭha lokuttaracittānīti chabbīsati cittāni
anya-e0102n8:53_3: rūpaṁ, iriyāpathañca janayanti, na viññattiṁ. Kāmāvacare dasa bhavaṅgacittāni, rūpāvacare
anya-e0102n8:53_5: cittāni rūpameva janayanti, na iriyāpathaṁ, na viññattiṁ. Dvepañcaviññāṇāni, sabbasattānaṁ
anya-e0102n8:53_6: paṭisandhicittaṁ, khīṇāsavānaṁ cuticittaṁ, cattāri āruppavipākānīti soḷasa cittāni
anya-e0102n8:53_7: neva rūpaṁ janayanti, na iriyāpathaṁ, na viññattiṁ. Yāni cettha rūpaṁ janenti, tāni
anya-e0102n8:53_8: na ṭhitikkhaṇe, bhaṅgakkhaṇe vā, tadā hi cittaṁ dubbalaṁ hoti. Uppādakkhaṇe pana
anya-e0102n8:53_9: balavaṁ, tasmā taṁ tadā purejātaṁ vatthuṁ nissāya rūpaṁ samuṭṭhāpeti.
anya-e0102n8:54_0: Cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ nāma tayo arūpino khandhā, “saddanavakaṁ, kāyaviññatti, vacīviññatti,
anya-e0102n8:54_1: ākāsadhātu, lahutā, mudutā, kammaññatā, upacayo, santatī”ti sattarasavidhaṁ rūpañca.
anya-e0102n8:54_2: Cittapaccayaṁ nāma “pacchājātā cittacetasikā dhammā purejātassa imassa kāyassā”ti
anya-e0102n8:54_3: evaṁ vuttaṁ catusamuṭṭhānarūpaṁ. Cittapaccayaāhārasamuṭṭhānaṁ nāma cittasamuṭṭhānarūpesu
anya-e0102n8:54_4: ṭhānappattā ojā aññaṁ ojaṭṭhamakaṁ samuṭṭhāpeti, evaṁ dve tisso pavattiyo ghaṭeti.
anya-e0102n8:54_5: Cittapaccayautusamuṭṭhānaṁ nāma cittasamuṭṭhāno utu ṭhānappatto aññaṁ ojaṭṭhamakaṁ
anya-e0102n8:54_6: samuṭṭhāpeti, evaṁ dve tisso pavattiyo ghaṭeti. Evaṁ cittajarūpassa nibbatti passitabbā.
anya-e0102n8:55_1: āhārapaccayautusamuṭṭhānanti esa vibhāgo veditabbo. Tattha āhāro nāma kabaḷīkāro
anya-e0102n8:55_2: āhāro. Āhārasamuṭṭhānaṁ nāma upādiṇṇaṁ kammajarūpaṁ paccayaṁ labhitvā tattha patiṭṭhāya
anya-e0102n8:55_3: ṭhānappattāya ojāya samuṭṭhāpitaṁ ojaṭṭhamakaṁ, ākāsadhātu, lahutā, mudutā, kammaññatā,
anya-e0102n8:55_4: upacayo, santatīti cuddasavidhaṁ rūpaṁ. Āhārapaccayaṁ nāma “kabaḷīkāro āhāro imassa
anya-e0102n8:55_5: kāyassa āhārapaccayena paccayo”ti evaṁ vuttaṁ catusamuṭṭhānarūpaṁ. Āhārapaccayaāhārasamuṭṭhānaṁ
anya-e0102n8:55_6: nāma āhārasamuṭṭhānesu rūpesu ṭhānappattā ojā aññaṁ ojaṭṭhamakaṁ samuṭṭhāpeti, tatrāpi
anya-e0102n8:55_7: ojā aññanti evaṁ dasadvādasavāre pavattiṁ ghaṭeti. Ekadivasaṁ paribhuttāhāro sattāhampi
anya-e0102n8:55_8: upatthambheti. Dibbā pana ojā ekamāsaṁ dvemāsampi upatthambheti. Mātarā paribhuttāhāropi
anya-e0102n8:55_9: dārakassa sarīraṁ pharitvā rūpaṁ samuṭṭhāpeti. Sarīre makkhitāhāropi rūpaṁ samuṭṭhāpeti.
anya-e0102n8:55_10: Kammajāhāro upādiṇṇakāhāro nāma. Sopi ṭhānappatto rūpaṁ samuṭṭhāpeti, tatrāpi ojā
anya-e0102n8:55_11: aññaṁ samuṭṭhāpetīti evaṁ catasso vā pañca vā pavattiyo ghaṭeti. Āhārapaccayautusamuṭṭhānaṁ
anya-e0102n8:55_12: nāma āhārasamuṭṭhānā tejodhātu ṭhānappattā utusamuṭṭhānaṁ ojaṭṭhamakaṁ samuṭṭhāpeti.
anya-e0102n8:55_13: Tatrāyaṁ āhāro āhārasamuṭṭhānānaṁ janako hutvā paccayo hoti, sesānaṁ nissayāhāraatthiavigatavasenāti
anya-e0102n8:56_0: 704. Utujesupi utu, utusamuṭṭhānaṁ, utupaccayaṁ, utupaccayautusamuṭṭhānaṁ, utupaccayaāhārasamuṭṭhānanti
anya-e0102n8:56_1: esa vibhāgo veditabbo. Tattha utu nāma catusamuṭṭhānā tejodhātu, uṇhautu sītautūti
anya-e0102n8:56_2: evaṁ panesa duvidho hoti. Utusamuṭṭhānaṁ nāma catusamuṭṭhāno utu upādiṇṇakaṁ paccayaṁ
anya-e0102n8:56_3: labhitvā ṭhānappatto sarīre rūpaṁ samuṭṭhāpeti. Taṁ saddanavakaṁ, ākāsadhātu, lahutā,
anya-e0102n8:56_4: mudutā, kammaññatā, upacayo, santatīti pannarasavidhaṁ hoti. Utupaccayaṁ nāma utu
anya-e0102n8:56_5: catusamuṭṭhānikarūpānaṁ pavattiyā ca vināsassa ca paccayo hoti. Utupaccayautusamuṭṭhānaṁ
anya-e0102n8:56_6: nāma utusamuṭṭhānā tejodhātu ṭhānappattā aññaṁ ojaṭṭhamakaṁ samuṭṭhāpeti, tatrāpi
anya-e0102n8:56_7: utu aññanti evaṁ dīghampi addhānaṁ anupādiṇṇapakkhe ṭhatvāpi utusamuṭṭhānaṁ pavattatiyeva.
anya-e0102n8:56_8: Utupaccayaāhārasamuṭṭhānaṁ nāma utusamuṭṭhānā ṭhānappattā ojā aññaṁ ojaṭṭhamakaṁ
anya-e0102n8:56_9: samuṭṭhāpeti, tatrāpi ojā aññanti evaṁ dasadvādasavāre pavattiṁ ghaṭeti. Tatrāyaṁ
anya-e0102n8:56_10: utu utusamuṭṭhānānaṁ janako hutvā paccayo hoti, sesānaṁ nissayaatthiavigatavasenāti
anya-e0102n8:56_11: evaṁ utujarūpassa nibbatti passitabbā. Evañhi rūpassa nibbattiṁ passanto kālena rūpaṁ sammasati nāma.
anya-e0102n8:58: 705. Yathā ca rūpaṁ sammasantena rūpassa, evaṁ arūpaṁ sammasantenapi arūpassa nibbatti passitabbā. Sā ca kho ekāsīti lokiyacittuppādavaseneva.
anya-e0102n8:59_0: Seyyathidaṁ – idañhi arūpaṁ nāma purimabhave āyūhitakammavasena paṭisandhiyaṁ tāva
anya-e0102n8:59_2: vuttanayeneva veditabbo. Tadeva paṭisandhicittassa anantaracittato paṭṭhāya bhavaṅgavasena,
anya-e0102n8:59_3: āyupariyosāne cutivasena. Yaṁ tattha kāmāvacaraṁ, taṁ chasu dvāresu balavārammaṇe tadārammaṇavasena.
anya-e0102n8:60_0: Pavatte pana asambhinnattā cakkhussa āpāthagatattā rūpānaṁ ālokasannissitaṁ manasikārahetukaṁ
anya-e0102n8:60_1: cakkhuviññāṇaṁ nibbattati saddhiṁ sampayuttadhammehi. Cakkhupasādassa hi ṭhitikkhaṇe
anya-e0102n8:60_2: ṭhitippattameva rūpaṁ cakkhuṁ ghaṭṭeti. Tasmiṁ ghaṭṭite dvikkhattuṁ bhavaṅgaṁ uppajjitvā
anya-e0102n8:60_3: nirujjhati. Tato tasmiṁyeva ārammaṇe kiriyamanodhātu āvajjanakiccaṁ sādhayamānā uppajjati.
anya-e0102n8:60_4: Tadanantaraṁ tadeva rūpaṁ passamānaṁ kusalavipākaṁ akusalavipākaṁ vā cakkhuviññāṇaṁ.
anya-e0102n8:60_5: Tato tadeva rūpaṁ sampaṭicchamānā vipākamanodhātu. Tato tadeva rūpaṁ santīrayamānā
anya-e0102n8:60_6: vipākāhetukamanoviññāṇadhātu. Tato tadeva rūpaṁ vavatthāpayamānā kiriyāhetukamanoviññāṇadhātu
anya-e0102n8:60_7: upekkhāsahagatā. Tato paraṁ kāmāvacarakusalākusalakiriyacittesu ekaṁ vā upekkhāsahagatāhetukaṁ
anya-e0102n8:60_8: cittaṁ pañca satta vā javanāni. Tato kāmāvacarasattānaṁ ekādasasu tadārammaṇacittesu
anya-e0102n8:60_9: javanānurūpaṁ yaṁkiñci tadārammaṇanti. Esa nayo sesadvāresupi. Manodvāre pana mahaggatacittānipi
anya-e0102n8:60_10: uppajjantīti. Evaṁ chasu dvāresu arūpassa nibbatti passitabbā. Evañhi arūpassa nibbattiṁ
anya-e0102n8:61: Evaṁ kālena rūpaṁ kālena arūpaṁ sammasitvāpi tilakkhaṇaṁ āropetvā anukkamena paṭipajjamāno eko paññābhāvanaṁ sampādeti.
anya-e0102n8:63_0: 706. Aparo rūpasattakaarūpasattakavasena tilakkhaṇaṁ āropetvā saṅkhāre sammasati.
anya-e0102n8:63_1: Tattha ādānanikkhepanato, vayovuḍḍhatthaṅgamato, āhāramayato, utumayato, kammajato,
anya-e0102n8:63_2: cittasamuṭṭhānato, dhammatārūpatoti imehi ākārehi āropetvā sammasanto rūpasattakavasena
anya-e0102n8:65: Āhārato ca ututo, kammato cāpi cittato;
anya-e0102n8:67_0: Tattha ādānanti paṭisandhi. Nikkhepananti cuti. Iti yogāvacaro imehi ādānanikkhepehi
anya-e0102n8:67_1: ekaṁ vassasataṁ paricchinditvā saṅkhāresu tilakkhaṇaṁ āropeti. Kathaṁ? Etthantare
anya-e0102n8:67_2: sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā. Kasmā? Uppādavayavattito, vipariṇāmato, tāvakālikato, niccapaṭikkhepato
anya-e0102n8:67_3: ca. Yasmā pana uppannā saṅkhārā ṭhitiṁ pāpuṇanti, ṭhitiyaṁ jarāya kilamanti, jaraṁ
anya-e0102n8:67_4: patvā avassaṁ bhijjanti, tasmā abhiṇhasampaṭipīḷanato, dukkhamato dukkhavatthuto,
anya-e0102n8:67_5: sukhapaṭikkhepato ca dukkhā. Yasmā ca “uppannā saṅkhārā ṭhitiṁ mā pāpuṇantu, ṭhānappattā
anya-e0102n8:67_6: mā jīrantu, jarappattā mā bhijjantū”ti imesu tīsu ṭhānesu kassaci vasavattibhāvo
anya-e0102n8:67_7: natthi, suññā tena vasavattanākārena, tasmā suññato, assāmikato, avasavattito, attapaṭikkhepato ca anattāti.
anya-e0102n8:68_0: 707. Evaṁ ādānanikkhepanavasena vassasataparicchinne rūpe tilakkhaṇaṁ āropetvā tato
anya-e0102n8:68_1: paraṁ vayovuḍḍhatthaṅgamato āropeti. Tattha vayovuḍḍhatthaṅgamo nāma vayavasena vuḍḍhassa
anya-e0102n8:68_2: vaḍḍhitassa rūpassa atthaṅgamo. Tassa vasena tilakkhaṇaṁ āropetīti attho.
anya-e0102n8:69_0: Kathaṁ? So tameva vassasataṁ paṭhamavayena majjhimavayena pacchimavayenāti tīhi vayehi
anya-e0102n8:69_1: paricchindati. Tattha ādito tettiṁsa vassāni paṭhamavayo nāma. Tato catuttiṁsa majjhimavayo
anya-e0102n8:69_2: nāma. Tato tettiṁsa pacchimavayo nāmāti. Iti imehi tīhi vayehi paricchinditvā, “paṭhamavaye
anya-e0102n8:69_3: pavattaṁ rūpaṁ majjhimavayaṁ appatvā tattheva nirujjhati, tasmā taṁ aniccaṁ. Yadaniccaṁ,
anya-e0102n8:69_4: taṁ dukkhaṁ. Yaṁ dukkhaṁ, tadanattā. Majjhimavaye pavattarūpampi pacchimavayaṁ appatvā
anya-e0102n8:69_5: tattheva nirujjhati, tasmā tampi aniccaṁ dukkhamanattā. Pacchimavaye tettiṁsa vassāni
anya-e0102n8:69_6: pavattarūpampi maraṇato paraṁ gamanasamatthaṁ nāma natthi, tasmā tampi aniccaṁ dukkhamanattā”ti
anya-e0102n8:70_0: 708. Evaṁ paṭhamavayādivasena vayovuḍḍhatthaṅgamato tilakkhaṇaṁ āropetvā puna “mandadasakaṁ,
anya-e0102n8:70_1: khiḍḍādasakaṁ, vaṇṇadasakaṁ, baladasakaṁ, paññādasakaṁ, hānidasakaṁ, pabbhāradasakaṁ,
anya-e0102n8:70_2: vaṅkadasakaṁ, momūhadasakaṁ, sayanadasaka”nti imesaṁ dasannaṁ dasakānaṁ vasena vayovuḍḍhatthaṅgamato
anya-e0102n8:71_0: Tattha dasakesu tāva vassasatajīvino puggalassa paṭhamāni dasa vassāni mandadasakaṁ
anya-e0102n8:71_1: nāma, tadā hi so mando hoti capalo kumārako. Tato parāni dasa khiḍḍādasakaṁ nāma,
anya-e0102n8:71_2: tadā hi so khiḍḍāratibahulo hoti. Tato parāni dasa vaṇṇadasakaṁ nāma, tadā hissa
anya-e0102n8:71_3: vaṇṇāyatanaṁ vepullaṁ pāpuṇāti. Tato parāni dasa baladasakaṁ nāma, tadā hissa balañca
anya-e0102n8:71_4: thāmo ca vepullaṁ pāpuṇāti. Tato parāni dasa paññādasakaṁ nāma, tadā hissa paññā
anya-e0102n8:71_5: suppatiṭṭhitā hoti, pakatiyā kira dubbalapaññassāpi tasmiṁ kāle appamattakā paññā
anya-e0102n8:71_6: uppajjatiyeva. Tato parāni dasa hānidasakaṁ nāma, tadā hissa khiḍḍārativaṇṇabalapaññā
anya-e0102n8:71_7: parihāyanti. Tato parāni dasa pabbhāradasakaṁ nāma, tadā hissa attabhāvo purato pabbhāro
anya-e0102n8:71_8: hoti. Tato parāni dasa vaṅkadasakaṁ nāma, tadā hissa attabhāvo naṅgalakoṭi viya vaṅko
anya-e0102n8:71_9: hoti. Tato parāni dasa momūhadasakaṁ nāma. Tadā hi so momūho hoti, kataṁ kataṁ pamussati.
anya-e0102n8:71_10: Tato parāni dasa sayanadasakaṁ nāma, vassasatiko hi sayanabahulova hoti.
anya-e0102n8:72_0: Tatrāyaṁ yogī etesaṁ dasakānaṁ vasena vayovuḍḍhatthaṅgamato tilakkhaṇaṁ āropetuṁ
anya-e0102n8:72_1: iti paṭisañcikkhati – “paṭhamadasake pavattarūpaṁ dutiyadasakaṁ appatvā tattheva
anya-e0102n8:72_2: nirujjhati, tasmā taṁ aniccaṁ dukkhamanattā. Dutiyadasake…pe… navamadasake pavattarūpaṁ
anya-e0102n8:72_3: dasamadasakaṁ appatvā tattheva nirujjhati. Dasamadasake pavattarūpaṁ punabbhavaṁ
anya-e0102n8:72_4: appatvā idheva nirujjhati, tasmā tampi aniccaṁ dukkhamanattā”ti tilakkhaṇaṁ āropeti.
anya-e0102n8:73_0: 709. Evaṁ dasakavasena vayovuḍḍhatthaṅgamato tilakkhaṇaṁ āropetvā puna tadeva vassasataṁ
anya-e0102n8:73_1: pañcapañcavassavasena vīsatikoṭṭhāse katvā vayovuḍḍhatthaṅgamato tilakkhaṇaṁ āropeti.
anya-e0102n8:73_2: Kathaṁ? So hi iti paṭisañcikkhati – “paṭhame vassapañcake pavattarūpaṁ dutiyaṁ vassapañcakaṁ
anya-e0102n8:73_3: appatvā tattheva nirujjhati, tasmā taṁ aniccaṁ dukkhamanattā. Dutiye vassapañcake
anya-e0102n8:73_4: pavattarūpaṁ tatiyaṁ…pe… ekūnavīsatime vassapañcake pavattarūpaṁ vīsatimaṁ vassapañcakaṁ
anya-e0102n8:73_5: appatvā tattheva nirujjhati. Vīsatime vassapañcake pavattarūpaṁ maraṇato paraṁ gamanasamatthaṁ
anya-e0102n8:73_6: nāma natthi, tasmā tampi aniccaṁ dukkhamanattā”ti.
anya-e0102n8:74_0: Evaṁ vīsatikoṭṭhāsavasena vayovuḍḍhatthaṅgamato tilakkhaṇaṁ āropetvā puna pañcavīsati
anya-e0102n8:74_1: koṭṭhāse katvā catunnaṁ catunnaṁ vassānaṁ vasena āropeti. Tato tettiṁsa koṭṭhāse
anya-e0102n8:74_2: katvā tiṇṇaṁ tiṇṇaṁ vassānaṁ vasena, paññāsa koṭṭhāse katvā dvinnaṁ dvinnaṁ vassānaṁ
anya-e0102n8:74_3: vasena, sataṁ koṭṭhāse katvā ekekavassavasena. Tato ekaṁ vassaṁ tayo koṭṭhāse katvā
anya-e0102n8:74_4: vassānahemantagimhesu tīsu utūsu ekekautuvasena tasmiṁ vayovuḍḍhatthaṅgamarūpe tilakkhaṇaṁ āropeti.
anya-e0102n8:75_0: Kathaṁ? “Vassāne catumāsaṁ pavattarūpaṁ hemantaṁ appatvā tattheva niruddhaṁ. Hemante
anya-e0102n8:75_1: pavattarūpaṁ gimhaṁ appatvā tattheva niruddhaṁ. Gimhe pavattarūpaṁ puna vassānaṁ
anya-e0102n8:75_2: appatvā tattheva niruddhaṁ, tasmā taṁ aniccaṁ dukkhamanattā”ti. Evaṁ āropetvā puna
anya-e0102n8:75_3: ekaṁ vassaṁ cha koṭṭhāse katvā – “vassāne dvemāsaṁ pavattarūpaṁ saradaṁ appatvā tattheva
anya-e0102n8:75_4: niruddhaṁ. Sarade pavattarūpaṁ hemantaṁ. Hemante pavattarūpaṁ sisiraṁ. Sisire pavattarūpaṁ
anya-e0102n8:75_5: vasantaṁ. Vasante pavattarūpaṁ gimhaṁ. Gimhe pavattarūpaṁ puna vassānaṁ appatvā tattheva
anya-e0102n8:75_6: niruddhaṁ, tasmā aniccaṁ dukkhamanattā”ti evaṁ tasmiṁ vayovuḍḍhatthaṅgamarūpe tilakkhaṇaṁ āropeti.
anya-e0102n8:76_0: Evaṁ āropetvā tato kāḷajuṇhavasena – “kāḷe pavattarūpaṁ juṇhaṁ appatvā. Juṇhe pavattarūpaṁ
anya-e0102n8:76_1: kāḷaṁ appatvā tattheva niruddhaṁ, tasmā aniccaṁ dukkhamanattā”ti tilakkhaṇaṁ āropeti.
anya-e0102n8:76_2: Tato rattindivavasena – “rattiṁ pavattarūpaṁ divasaṁ appatvā tattheva niruddhaṁ.
anya-e0102n8:76_3: Divasaṁ pavattarūpampi rattiṁ appatvā tattheva niruddhaṁ, tasmā aniccaṁ dukkhamanattā”ti
anya-e0102n8:76_4: tilakkhaṇaṁ āropeti. Tato tadeva rattindivaṁ pubbaṇhādivasena cha koṭṭhāse katvā
anya-e0102n8:76_5: – “pubbaṇhe pavattarūpaṁ majjhanhaṁ appatvā. Majjhanhe pavattarūpaṁ sāyanhaṁ. Sāyanhe
anya-e0102n8:76_6: pavattarūpaṁ paṭhamayāmaṁ. Paṭhamayāme pavattarūpaṁ majjhimayāmaṁ. Majjhimayāme pavattarūpaṁ
anya-e0102n8:76_7: pacchimayāmaṁ appatvā tattheva niruddhaṁ. Pacchimayāme pavattarūpaṁ puna pubbaṇhaṁ
anya-e0102n8:76_8: appatvā tattheva niruddhaṁ, tasmā aniccaṁ dukkhamanattā”ti tilakkhaṇaṁ āropeti.
anya-e0102n8:77_1: – “abhikkame pavattarūpaṁ paṭikkamaṁ appatvā tattheva nirujjhati. Paṭikkame pavattarūpaṁ
anya-e0102n8:77_2: ālokanaṁ. Ālokane pavattarūpaṁ vilokanaṁ. Vilokane pavattarūpaṁ samiñjanaṁ. Samiñjane
anya-e0102n8:77_3: pavattarūpaṁ pasāraṇaṁ appatvā tattheva nirujjhati. Tasmā aniccaṁ dukkhamanattā”ti
anya-e0102n8:78: Tato ekapadavāraṁ uddharaṇa atiharaṇavītiharaṇavossajjanasannikkhepanasannirumbhanavasena cha koṭṭhāse karoti.
anya-e0102n8:79_0: Tattha uddharaṇaṁ nāma pādassa bhūmito ukkhipanaṁ. Atiharaṇaṁ nāma purato haraṇaṁ.
anya-e0102n8:79_1: Vītiharaṇaṁ nāma khāṇukaṇṭakadīghajātiādīsu kiñcideva disvā ito cito ca pādasañcāraṇaṁ.
anya-e0102n8:79_2: Vossajjanaṁ nāma pādassa heṭṭhā oropanaṁ. Sannikkhepanaṁ nāma pathavītale ṭhapanaṁ.
anya-e0102n8:79_3: Sannirumbhanaṁ nāma puna pāduddharaṇakāle pādassa pathaviyā saddhiṁ abhinippīḷanaṁ.
anya-e0102n8:79_4: Tattha uddharaṇe pathavīdhātu āpodhātūti dve dhātuyo omattā honti mandā, itarā dve
anya-e0102n8:79_5: adhimattā honti balavatiyo. Tathā atiharaṇavītiharaṇesu. Vossajjane tejodhātu vāyodhātūti
anya-e0102n8:79_6: dve dhātuyo omattā honti mandā, itarā dve adhimattā honti balavatiyo. Tathā sannikkhepanasannirumbhanesu.
anya-e0102n8:79_7: Evaṁ cha koṭṭhāse katvā tesaṁ vasena tasmiṁ vayovuḍḍhatthaṅgamarūpe tilakkhaṇaṁ āropeti.
anya-e0102n8:80_0: Kathaṁ? So iti paṭisañcikkhati – “yā uddharaṇe pavattā dhātuyo, yāni ca tadupādāyarūpāni,
anya-e0102n8:80_1: sabbe te dhammā atiharaṇaṁ appatvā ettheva nirujjhanti, tasmā aniccā dukkhā anattā.
anya-e0102n8:80_2: Tathā atiharaṇe pavattā vītiharaṇaṁ. Vītiharaṇe pavattā vossajjanaṁ. Vossajjane pavattā
anya-e0102n8:80_3: sannikkhepanaṁ. Sannikkhepane pavattā sannirumbhanaṁ appatvā ettheva nirujjhanti.
anya-e0102n8:80_4: Iti tattha tattha uppannā itaraṁ itaraṁ koṭṭhāsaṁ appatvā tattha tattheva pabbaṁ
anya-e0102n8:80_5: pabbaṁ sandhi sandhi odhi odhi hutvā tattakapāle pakkhittatilā viya taṭataṭāyantā
anya-e0102n8:80_6: saṅkhārā bhijjanti. Tasmā aniccā dukkhā anattā”ti. Tassevaṁ pabbapabbagate saṅkhāre
anya-e0102n8:81_0: 711. Sukhumatte ca panassa idaṁ opammaṁ. Eko kira dārutiṇukkādīsu kataparicayo adiṭṭhapubbapadīpo
anya-e0102n8:81_1: paccantavāsiko nagaramāgamma antarāpaṇe jalamānaṁ padīpaṁ disvā ekaṁ purisaṁ pucchi
anya-e0102n8:81_2: ambho “kiṁ nāmetaṁ evaṁ manāpa”nti? Tamenaṁ so āha “kimettha manāpaṁ, padīpo nāmesa
anya-e0102n8:81_3: telakkhayena vaṭṭikkhayena ca gatamaggopissa na paññāyissatī”ti. Tamañño evamāha
anya-e0102n8:81_4: “idaṁ oḷārikaṁ, imissā hi vaṭṭiyā anupubbena ḍayhamānāya tatiyabhāge tatiyabhāge
anya-e0102n8:81_5: jālā itarītaraṁ padesaṁ appatvāva nirujjhissatī”ti. Tamañño evamāha “idampi oḷārikaṁ,
anya-e0102n8:81_6: imissā hi aṅgulaṅgulantare aḍḍhaṅgulaḍḍhaṅgulantare tantumhi tantumhi aṁsumhi aṁsumhi
anya-e0102n8:81_7: jālā itarītaraṁ aṁsuṁ appatvāva nirujjhissati. Aṁsuṁ pana muñcitvā na sakkā jālaṁ paññāpetu”nti.
anya-e0102n8:82_0: Tattha “telakkhayena vaṭṭikkhayena ca padīpassa gatamaggopi na paññāyissatī”ti purisassa
anya-e0102n8:82_1: ñāṇaṁ viya yogino ādānanikkhepanato vassasatena paricchinnarūpe tilakkhaṇāropanaṁ.
anya-e0102n8:82_2: “Vaṭṭiyā tatiyabhāge tatiyabhāge jālā itarītaraṁ padesaṁ appatvāva nirujjhissatī”ti
anya-e0102n8:82_3: purisassa ñāṇaṁ viya yogino vassasatassa tatiyakoṭṭhāsaparicchinne vayovuḍḍhatthaṅgamarūpe
anya-e0102n8:82_4: tilakkhaṇāropanaṁ. “Aṅgulaṅgulantare jālā itarītaraṁ appatvāva nirujjhissatī”ti purisassa
anya-e0102n8:82_5: ñāṇaṁ viya yogino dasavassa pañcavassa catuvassa tivassa dvivassa ekavassa paricchinne
anya-e0102n8:82_6: rūpe tilakkhaṇāropanaṁ. “Aḍḍhaṅgulaḍḍhaṅgulantare jālā itarītaraṁ appatvāva nirujjhissatī”ti
anya-e0102n8:82_7: purisassa ñāṇaṁ viya yogino ekekautuvasena ekaṁ vassaṁ tidhā, chadhā ca vibhajitvā
anya-e0102n8:82_8: catumāsa-dvimāsaparicchinne rūpe tilakkhaṇāropanaṁ. “Tantumhi tantumhi jālā itarītaraṁ
anya-e0102n8:82_9: appatvāva nirujjhissatī”ti purisassa ñāṇaṁ viya yogino kāḷajuṇhavasena, rattindivavasena,
anya-e0102n8:82_10: ekarattindivaṁ cha koṭṭhāse katvā pubbaṇhādivasena ca paricchinne rūpe tilakkhaṇāropanaṁ.
anya-e0102n8:82_11: “Aṁsumhi aṁsumhi jālā itarītaraṁ appatvāva nirujjhissatī”ti purisassa ñāṇaṁ viya
anya-e0102n8:82_12: yogino abhikkamādivasena ceva uddharaṇādīsu ca ekekakoṭṭhāsavasena paricchinne rūpe
anya-e0102n8:83_0: 712. So evaṁ nānākārehi vayovuḍḍhatthaṅgamarūpe tilakkhaṇaṁ āropetvā puna tadeva
anya-e0102n8:83_1: rūpaṁ visaṅkharitvā āhāramayādivasena cattāro koṭṭhāse katvā ekekakoṭṭhāse tilakkhaṇaṁ
anya-e0102n8:83_2: āropeti. Tatrāssa āhāramayaṁ rūpaṁ chātasuhitavasena pākaṭaṁ hoti. Chātakāle samuṭṭhitaṁ
anya-e0102n8:83_3: rūpaṁ hi jhattaṁ hoti kilantaṁ, jhāmakhāṇuko viya, aṅgārapacchiyaṁ nilīnakāko viya
anya-e0102n8:83_4: ca dubbaṇṇaṁ dussaṇṭhitaṁ. Suhitakāle samuṭṭhitaṁ dhātaṁ pīṇitaṁ mudu siniddhaṁ phassavantaṁ
anya-e0102n8:83_5: hoti. So taṁ pariggahetvā “chātakāle pavattarūpaṁ suhitakālaṁ appatvā ettheva nirujjhati.
anya-e0102n8:83_6: Suhitakāle samuṭṭhitampi chātakālaṁ appatvā ettheva nirujjhati, tasmā taṁ aniccaṁ
anya-e0102n8:84_0: 713.Utumayaṁ sītuṇhavasena pākaṭaṁ hoti. Uṇhakāle samuṭṭhitaṁ rūpaṁ hi jhattaṁ hoti
anya-e0102n8:84_1: kilantaṁ dubbaṇṇaṁ. Sītautunā samuṭṭhitaṁ rūpaṁ dhātaṁ pīṇitaṁ siniddhaṁ hoti. So
anya-e0102n8:84_2: taṁ pariggahetvā “uṇhakāle pavattarūpaṁ sītakālaṁ appatvā ettheva nirujjhati. Sītakāle
anya-e0102n8:84_3: pavattarūpaṁ uṇhakālaṁ appatvā ettheva nirujjhati, tasmā taṁ aniccaṁ dukkhamanattā”ti
anya-e0102n8:85_0: 714.Kammajaṁ āyatanadvāravasena pākaṭaṁ hoti. Cakkhudvārasmiṁ hi cakkhukāyabhāvadasakavasena
anya-e0102n8:85_1: tiṁsa kammajarūpāni, upatthambhakāni pana tesaṁ utucittāhārasamuṭṭhānāni catuvīsatīti
anya-e0102n8:85_2: catupaṇṇāsa honti. Tathā sotaghānajivhādvāresu. Kāyadvāre kāyabhāvadasakavasena ceva
anya-e0102n8:86_0: So sabbampi taṁ rūpaṁ pariggahetvā “cakkhudvāre pavattarūpaṁ sotadvāraṁ appatvā ettheva
anya-e0102n8:86_1: nirujjhati. Sotadvāre pavattarūpaṁ ghānadvāraṁ. Ghānadvāre pavattarūpaṁ jivhādvāraṁ.
anya-e0102n8:86_2: Jivhādvāre pavattarūpaṁ kāyadvāraṁ. Kāyadvāre pavattarūpaṁ manodvāraṁ appatvā ettheva
anya-e0102n8:86_3: nirujjhati, tasmā taṁ aniccaṁ dukkhamanattā”ti evaṁ tattha tilakkhaṇaṁ āropeti.
anya-e0102n8:87_1: hi rūpaṁ siniddhaṁ mudu pīṇitaṁ phassavantaṁ hoti. Domanassitakāle uppannaṁ jhattaṁ
anya-e0102n8:87_2: kilantaṁ dubbaṇṇaṁ hoti. So taṁ pariggahetvā “somanassitakāle pavattarūpaṁ domanassitakālaṁ
anya-e0102n8:87_3: appatvā ettheva nirujjhati. Domanassitakāle pavattarūpaṁ somanassitakālaṁ appatvā
anya-e0102n8:87_4: ettheva nirujjhati, tasmā taṁ aniccaṁ dukkhamanattā”ti evaṁ tattha tilakkhaṇaṁ āropeti.
anya-e0102n8:88: Tassevaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānarūpaṁ pariggahetvā tattha tilakkhaṇaṁ āropayato ayamattho pākaṭo hoti –
anya-e0102n8:89: Jīvitaṁ attabhāvo ca, sukhadukkhā ca kevalā;
anya-e0102n8:91: Cullāsīti sahassāni, kappaṁ tiṭṭhanti ye marū;
anya-e0102n8:92: Na tveva tepi tiṭṭhanti, dvīhi cittehi samohitā.
anya-e0102n8:93: Ye niruddhā marantassa, tiṭṭhamānassa vā idha;
anya-e0102n8:95: Anantarā ca ye bhaggā, ye ca bhaggā anāgate;
anya-e0102n8:105_0: 716. Evaṁ āhāramayādīsu tilakkhaṇaṁ āropetvā puna dhammatārūpe tilakkhaṇaṁ āropeti.
anya-e0102n8:105_2: vivaṭṭakappato paṭṭhāya uppajjanakarūpaṁ. Tadassa asokaṅkurādivasena pākaṭaṁ hoti.
anya-e0102n8:106_0: Asokaṅkuraṁ hi āditova tanurattaṁ hoti, tato dvīhatīhaccayena ghanarattaṁ, puna dvīhatīhaccayena
anya-e0102n8:106_1: mandarattaṁ, tato taruṇapallavavaṇṇaṁ, tato pariṇatapallavavaṇṇaṁ, tato haritapaṇṇavaṇṇaṁ.
anya-e0102n8:106_2: Tato nīlapaṇṇavaṇṇaṁ. Tato nīlapaṇṇavaṇṇakālato paṭṭhāya sabhāgarūpasantatimanuppabandhāpayamānaṁ
anya-e0102n8:106_3: saṁvaccharamattena paṇḍupalāsaṁ hutvā vaṇṭato chijjitvā patati.
anya-e0102n8:107_0: So taṁ pariggahetvā “tanurattakāle pavattarūpaṁ ghanarattakālaṁ appatvā nirujjhati.
anya-e0102n8:107_1: Ghanarattakāle pavattarūpaṁ mandarattakālaṁ. Mandarattakāle pavattarūpaṁ taruṇapallavavaṇṇakālaṁ.
anya-e0102n8:107_3: pavattaṁ haritapaṇṇavaṇṇakālaṁ. Haritapaṇṇakāle pavattaṁ nīlapaṇṇavaṇṇakālaṁ. Nīlapaṇṇavaṇṇakāle
anya-e0102n8:107_4: pavattaṁ paṇḍupalāsakālaṁ. Paṇḍupalāsakāle pavattaṁ vaṇṭato chijjitvā patanakālaṁ
anya-e0102n8:107_5: appatvāva nirujjhati, tasmā taṁ aniccaṁ dukkhamanattā”ti tilakkhaṇaṁ āropeti, evaṁ
anya-e0102n8:107_6: tattha tilakkhaṇaṁ āropetvā iminā nayena sabbampi dhammatārūpaṁ sammasati.
anya-e0102n8:108: Evaṁ tāva rūpasattakavasena tilakkhaṇaṁ āropetvā saṅkhāre sammasati.
anya-e0102n8:110: 717. Yaṁ pana vuttaṁ “arūpasattakavasenā”ti, tattha ayaṁ mātikā – kalāpato, yamakato, khaṇikato, paṭipāṭito, diṭṭhiugghāṭanato, mānasamugghāṭanato, nikantipariyādānatoti.
anya-e0102n8:111_0: Tattha kalāpatoti phassapañcamakā dhammā. Kathaṁ kalāpato sammasatīti? Idha bhikkhu
anya-e0102n8:111_1: iti paṭisañcikkhati – “ye ime ‘kesā aniccā dukkhā anattā’ti sammasane uppannā phassapañcamakā
anya-e0102n8:111_2: dhammā, ye ca ‘lomā…pe… matthaluṅgaṁ aniccaṁ dukkhamanattā’ti sammasane uppannā phassapañcamakā
anya-e0102n8:111_3: dhammā, sabbe te itarītaraṁ appatvā pabbaṁpabbaṁ odhiodhi hutvā tattakapāle pakkhittatilā
anya-e0102n8:111_4: viya taṭataṭāyantā vinaṭṭhā, tasmā aniccā dukkhā anattā”ti. Ayaṁ tāva visuddhikathāyaṁ nayo.
anya-e0102n8:112_0: Ariyavaṁsakathāyaṁ pana “heṭṭhā rūpasattake sattasu ṭhānesu ‘rūpaṁ aniccaṁ dukkhamanattā’ti
anya-e0102n8:112_1: pavattaṁ cittaṁ aparena cittena ‘aniccaṁ dukkhamanattā’ti sammasanto ‘kalāpato sammasatī’ti”
anya-e0102n8:112_2: vuttaṁ, taṁ yuttataraṁ. Tasmā sesānipi teneva nayena vibhajissāma.
anya-e0102n8:113_1: tampi cittaṁ aparena cittena “aniccaṁ dukkhamanattā”ti sammasati. Vayovuḍḍhatthaṅgamarūpaṁ,
anya-e0102n8:113_2: āhāramayaṁ, utumayaṁ, kammajaṁ, cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ, dhammatārūpaṁ “aniccaṁ dukkhamanattā”ti
anya-e0102n8:113_3: sammasitvā tampi cittaṁ aparena cittena “aniccaṁ dukkhamanattā”ti sammasati. Evaṁ
anya-e0102n8:114_1: taṁ paṭhamacittaṁ dutiyacittena, dutiyaṁ tatiyena, tatiyaṁ catutthena, catutthaṁ
anya-e0102n8:114_2: pañcamena “etampi aniccaṁ dukkhamanattā”ti sammasati. Vayovuḍḍhatthaṅgamarūpaṁ, āhāramayaṁ,
anya-e0102n8:114_3: utumayaṁ, kammajaṁ, cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ, dhammatārūpaṁ “aniccaṁ dukkhamanattā”ti sammasitvā
anya-e0102n8:114_4: taṁ paṭhamacittaṁ dutiyacittena, dutiyaṁ tatiyena, tatiyaṁ catutthena, catutthaṁ
anya-e0102n8:114_5: pañcamena “etampi aniccaṁ dukkhamanattā”ti sammasati. Evaṁ rūpapariggāhakacittato
anya-e0102n8:114_6: paṭṭhāya cattāri cattāri cittāni sammasanto khaṇikato sammasati nāma.
anya-e0102n8:115_1: dutiyacittena, dutiyaṁ tatiyena, tatiyaṁ catutthena…pe… dasamaṁ ekādasamena “etampi
anya-e0102n8:115_2: aniccaṁ dukkhamanattā”ti sammasati. Vayovuḍḍhatthaṅgamarūpaṁ, āhāramayaṁ, utumayaṁ,
anya-e0102n8:115_3: kammajaṁ, cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ, dhammatārūpaṁ “aniccaṁ dukkhamanattā”ti sammasitvā taṁ
anya-e0102n8:115_4: paṭhamacittaṁ dutiyacittena, dutiyaṁ tatiyena, tatiyaṁ catutthena…pe… dasamaṁ ekādasamena
anya-e0102n8:115_5: “etampi aniccaṁ dukkhamanattā”ti evaṁ vipassanā paṭipāṭiyā sakalampi divasabhāgaṁ

anya-e0102n8:116_0: 721.Diṭṭhiugghāṭanato mānaugghāṭanato nikantipariyādānatoti imesu tīsu visuṁ sammasananayo
anya-e0102n8:116_1: nāma natthi. Yaṁ panetaṁ heṭṭhā rūpaṁ, idha ca arūpaṁ pariggahitaṁ, taṁ passanto
anya-e0102n8:116_2: rūpārūpato uddhaṁ aññaṁ sattaṁ nāma na passati. Sattassa adassanato paṭṭhāya sattasaññā
anya-e0102n8:116_3: ugghāṭitā hoti. Sattasaññaṁ ugghāṭitacittena saṅkhāre pariggaṇhato diṭṭhi nuppajjati.
anya-e0102n8:116_4: Diṭṭhiyā anuppajjamānāya diṭṭhi ugghāṭitā nāma hoti. Diṭṭhiugghāṭitacittena saṅkhāre
anya-e0102n8:116_5: pariggaṇhato māno nuppajjati. Māne anuppajjante māno samugghāṭito nāma hoti. Mānasamugghāṭitacittena
anya-e0102n8:116_6: saṅkhāre pariggaṇhato taṇhā nuppajjati. Taṇhāya anuppajjantiyā nikanti pariyādiṇṇā
anya-e0102n8:116_7: nāma hotīti idaṁ tāva visuddhikathāyaṁ vuttaṁ.
anya-e0102n8:117: Ariyavaṁsakathāyaṁ pana “diṭṭhiugghāṭanato mānasamugghāṭanato nikantipariyādānato”ti mātikaṁ ṭhapetvā ayaṁ nayo dassito.
anya-e0102n8:118_0: “Ahaṁ vipassāmi, mama vipassanā”ti gaṇhato hi diṭṭhisamugghāṭanaṁ nāma na hoti. “Saṅkhārāva
anya-e0102n8:118_1: saṅkhāre vipassanti sammasanti vavatthapenti pariggaṇhanti paricchindantī”ti gaṇhato
anya-e0102n8:119_0: “Suṭṭhu vipassāmi, manāpaṁ vipassāmī”ti gaṇhato mānasamugghāṭo nāma na hoti. “Saṅkhārāva
anya-e0102n8:119_1: saṅkhāre vipassanti sammasanti vavatthapenti pariggaṇhanti paricchindantī”ti gaṇhato
anya-e0102n8:120_0: “Vipassituṁ sakkomī”ti vipassanaṁ assādentassa nikantipariyādānaṁ nāma na hoti. “Saṅkhārāva
anya-e0102n8:120_1: saṅkhāre vipassanti sammasanti vavatthapenti pariggaṇhanti paricchindantī”ti gaṇhato
anya-e0102n8:121_0: Sace saṅkhārā attā bhaveyyuṁ, attāti gahetuṁ vaṭṭeyyuṁ, anattā ca pana attāti gahitā,
anya-e0102n8:121_1: tasmā te avasavattanaṭṭhena anattā, hutvā abhāvaṭṭhena aniccā, uppādavayapaṭipīḷanaṭṭhena
anya-e0102n8:122_0: Sace saṅkhārā niccā bhaveyyuṁ, niccāti gahetuṁ vaṭṭeyyuṁ, aniccā ca pana niccāti
anya-e0102n8:122_1: gahitā, tasmā te hutvā abhāvaṭṭhena aniccā, uppādavayapaṭipīḷanaṭṭhena dukkhā, avasavattanaṭṭhena
anya-e0102n8:123_0: Sace saṅkhārā sukhā bhaveyyuṁ, sukhāti gahetuṁ vaṭṭeyyuṁ, dukkhā ca pana sukhāti
anya-e0102n8:123_1: gahitā, tasmā te uppādavayapaṭipīḷanaṭṭhena dukkhā, hutvā abhāvaṭṭhena aniccā, avasavattanaṭṭhena
anya-e0102n8:124_0: Evaṁ saṅkhāre anattato passantassa diṭṭhisamugghāṭanaṁ nāma hoti. Aniccato passantassa
anya-e0102n8:124_1: mānasamugghāṭanaṁ nāma hoti. Dukkhato passantassa nikantipariyādānaṁ nāma hoti. Iti
anya-e0102n8:124_2: ayaṁ vipassanā attano attano ṭhāneyeva tiṭṭhatīti.
anya-e0102n8:125: Evaṁ arūpasattakavasenāpi tilakkhaṇaṁ āropetvā saṅkhāre sammasati. Ettāvatā panassa rūpakammaṭṭhānampi arūpakammaṭṭhānampi paguṇaṁ hoti.
anya-e0102n8:126_0: 722. So evaṁ paguṇarūpārūpakammaṭṭhāno yā upari bhaṅgānupassanato paṭṭhāya pahānapariññāvasena
anya-e0102n8:126_1: sabbākārato pattabbā aṭṭhārasa mahāvipassanā, tāsaṁ idheva tāva ekadesaṁ paṭivijjhanto
anya-e0102n8:127_0: Aṭṭhārasa mahāvipassanā nāma aniccānupassanādikā paññā. Yāsu aniccānupassanaṁ bhāvento
anya-e0102n8:127_1: niccasaññaṁ pajahati, dukkhānupassanaṁ bhāvento sukhasaññaṁ pajahati, anattānupassanaṁ
anya-e0102n8:127_2: bhāvento attasaññaṁ pajahati, nibbidānupassanaṁ bhāvento nandiṁ pajahati, virāgānupassanaṁ
anya-e0102n8:127_3: bhāvento rāgaṁ pajahati, nirodhānupassanaṁ bhāvento samudayaṁ pajahati, paṭinissaggānupassanaṁ
anya-e0102n8:127_4: bhāvento ādānaṁ pajahati, khayānupassanaṁ bhāvento ghanasaññaṁ pajahati, vayānupassanaṁ
anya-e0102n8:127_5: bhāvento āyūhanaṁ pajahati, vipariṇāmānupassanaṁ bhāvento dhuvasaññaṁ pajahati, animittānupassanaṁ
anya-e0102n8:127_6: bhāvento nimittaṁ pajahati, appaṇihitānupassanaṁ bhāvento paṇidhiṁ pajahati, suññatānupassanaṁ
anya-e0102n8:127_7: bhāvento abhinivesaṁ pajahati, adhipaññādhammavipassanaṁ bhāvento sārādānābhinivesaṁ
anya-e0102n8:127_8: pajahati, yathābhūtañāṇadassanaṁ bhāvento sammohābhinivesaṁ pajahati, ādīnavānupassanaṁ
anya-e0102n8:127_9: bhāvento ālayābhinivesaṁ pajahati, paṭisaṅkhānupassanaṁ bhāvento appaṭisaṅkhaṁ pajahati,
anya-e0102n8:128_0: Tāsu yasmā iminā aniccādilakkhaṇattayavasena saṅkhārā diṭṭhā, tasmā anicca-dukkha-anattānupassanā
anya-e0102n8:128_1: paṭividdhā honti. Yasmā ca “yā ca aniccānupassanā yā ca animittānupassanā, ime dhammā
anya-e0102n8:128_2: ekatthā, byañjanameva nānaṁ”. Tathā “yā ca dukkhānupassanā yā ca appaṇihitānupassanā,
anya-e0102n8:128_3: ime dhammā ekatthā, byañjanameva nānaṁ”. “Yā ca anattānupassanā yā ca suññatānupassanā,
anya-e0102n8:128_4: ime dhammā ekatthā, byañjanameva nāna”nti vuttaṁ. Tasmā tāpi paṭividdhā honti.
anya-e0102n8:129_0: Adhipaññādhammavipassanā pana sabbāpi vipassanā. Yathābhūtañāṇadassanaṁ kaṅkhāvitaraṇavisuddhiyā
anya-e0102n8:129_1: eva saṅgahitaṁ. Iti idampi dvayaṁ paṭividdhameva hoti. Sesesu vipassanāñāṇesu kiñci
anya-e0102n8:129_2: paṭividdhaṁ, kiñci appaṭividdhaṁ, tesaṁ vibhāgaṁ parato āvikarissāma.
anya-e0102n8:130_0: Yadeva hi paṭividdhaṁ, taṁ sandhāya idaṁ vuttaṁ “evaṁ paguṇarūpārūpakammaṭṭhāno yā
anya-e0102n8:130_1: upari bhaṅgānupassanato paṭṭhāya pahānapariññāvasena sabbākārato pattabbā aṭṭhārasa
anya-e0102n8:130_2: mahāvipassanā. Tāsaṁ idheva tāva ekadesaṁ paṭivijjhanto tappaṭipakkhe dhamme pajahatī”ti.
anya-e0102n8:132_0: 723. So evaṁ aniccānupassanādipaṭipakkhānaṁ niccasaññādīnaṁ pahānena visuddhañāṇo
anya-e0102n8:132_1: sammasanañāṇassa pāraṁ gantvā, yaṁ taṁ sammasanañāṇānantaraṁ “paccuppannānaṁ dhammānaṁ
anya-e0102n8:132_2: vipariṇāmānupassane paññā udayabbayānupassane ñāṇa”nti udayabbayānupassanaṁ vuttaṁ,
anya-e0102n8:132_3: tassa adhigamāya yogaṁ ārabhati. Ārabhamāno ca saṅkhepato tāva ārabhati. Tatrāyaṁ pāḷi –
anya-e0102n8:133_0: “Kathaṁ paccuppannānaṁ dhammānaṁ vipariṇāmānupassane paññā udayabbayānupassane ñāṇaṁ?
anya-e0102n8:133_1: Jātaṁ rūpaṁ paccuppannaṁ, tassa nibbattilakkhaṇaṁ udayo, vipariṇāmalakkhaṇaṁ vayo,
anya-e0102n8:133_2: anupassanā ñāṇaṁ. Jātā vedanā… saññā… saṅkhārā… viññāṇaṁ… jātaṁ cakkhu…pe… jāto bhavo
anya-e0102n8:133_3: paccuppanno, tassa nibbattilakkhaṇaṁ udayo, vipariṇāmalakkhaṇaṁ vayo, anupassanā ñāṇa”nti.
anya-e0102n8:134_0: So iminā pāḷinayena jātassa nāmarūpassa nibbattilakkhaṇaṁ jātiṁ uppādaṁ abhinavākāraṁ
anya-e0102n8:134_1: “udayo”ti, vipariṇāmalakkhaṇaṁ khayaṁ bhaṅgaṁ “vayo”ti samanupassati. So evaṁ pajānāti
anya-e0102n8:134_2: “imassa nāmarūpassa uppattito pubbe anuppannassa rāsi vā nicayo vā natthi, uppajjamānassāpi
anya-e0102n8:134_3: rāsito vā nicayato vā āgamanaṁ nāma natthi, nirujjhamānassāpi disāvidisāgamanaṁ nāma
anya-e0102n8:134_4: natthi, niruddhassāpi ekasmiṁ ṭhāne rāsito nicayato nidhānato avaṭṭhānaṁ nāma natthi.
anya-e0102n8:134_5: Yathā pana vīṇāya vādiyamānāya uppannasaddassa neva uppattito pubbe sannicayo atthi,
anya-e0102n8:134_6: na uppajjamāno sannicayato āgato, na nirujjhamānassa disāvidisāgamanaṁ atthi, na
anya-e0102n8:134_7: niruddho katthaci sannicito tiṭṭhati, atha kho vīṇañca upavīṇañca purisassa ca tajjaṁ
anya-e0102n8:134_8: vāyāmaṁ paṭicca ahutvā sambhoti, hutvā paṭiveti. Evaṁ sabbepi rūpārūpino dhammā ahutvā
anya-e0102n8:135: 724. Evaṁ saṅkhepato udayabbayamanasikāraṁ katvā puna yāni etasseva udayabbayañāṇassa vibhaṅge –
anya-e0102n8:136_2: rūpakkhandhassa udayaṁ passati. Nibbattilakkhaṇaṁ passantopi rūpakkhandhassa udayaṁ
anya-e0102n8:136_3: passati. Rūpakkhandhassa udayaṁ passanto imāni pañca lakkhaṇāni passati.
anya-e0102n8:137_1: Taṇhānirodhā… kammanirodhā… āhāranirodhā rūpanirodhoti paccayanirodhaṭṭhena rūpakkhandhassa
anya-e0102n8:137_2: vayaṁ passati. Vipariṇāmalakkhaṇaṁ passantopi rūpakkhandhassa vayaṁ passati. Rūpakkhandhassa
anya-e0102n8:137_3: vayaṁ passantopi imāni pañca lakkhaṇāni passati”.
anya-e0102n8:138_1: passati. Taṇhāsamudayā… kammasamudayā… phassasamudayā vedanāsamudayoti paccayasamudayaṭṭhena
anya-e0102n8:138_2: vedanākkhandhassa udayaṁ passati. Nibbattilakkhaṇaṁ passantopi vedanākkhandhassa
anya-e0102n8:138_3: udayaṁ passati. Vedanākkhandhassa udayaṁ passanto imāni pañca lakkhaṇāni passati.
anya-e0102n8:138_4: Avijjānirodhā… taṇhānirodhā… kammanirodhā… phassanirodhā vedanānirodhoti paccayanirodhaṭṭhena
anya-e0102n8:138_5: vedanākkhandhassa vayaṁ passati. Vipariṇāmalakkhaṇaṁ passantopi vedanākkhandhassa
anya-e0102n8:138_6: vayaṁ passati. Vedanākkhandhassa vayaṁ passanto imāni pañca lakkhaṇāni passati”.
anya-e0102n8:139: Vedanākkhandhassa viya ca saññāsaṅkhāraviññāṇakkhandhānaṁ. Ayaṁ pana viseso, viññāṇakkhandhassa phassaṭṭhāne “nāmarūpasamudayā, nāmarūpanirodhā”ti –
anya-e0102n8:140_0: Evaṁ ekekassa khandhassa udayabbayadassane dasa dasa katvā paññāsa lakkhaṇāni vuttāni.
anya-e0102n8:140_1: Tesaṁ vasena evampi rūpassa udayo evampi rūpassa vayo, evampi rūpaṁ udeti, evampi
anya-e0102n8:140_2: rūpaṁ vetīti paccayato ceva khaṇato ca vitthārena manasikāraṁ karoti.
anya-e0102n8:141_0: 725. Tassevaṁ manasikaroto “iti kirime dhammā ahutvā sambhonti, hutvā paṭiventī”ti
anya-e0102n8:141_1: ñāṇaṁ visadataraṁ hoti. Tassevaṁ paccayato ceva khaṇato ca dvedhā udayabbayaṁ passato
anya-e0102n8:142_0: 726. Yañhi so avijjādisamudayā khandhānaṁ samudayaṁ, avijjādinirodhā ca khandhānaṁ
anya-e0102n8:142_1: nirodhaṁ passati, idamassa paccayato udayabbayadassanaṁ. Yaṁ pana nibbattilakkhaṇavipariṇāmalakkhaṇāni
anya-e0102n8:142_2: passanto khandhānaṁ udayabbayaṁ passati, idamassa khaṇato udayabbayadassanaṁ, uppattikkhaṇeyeva
anya-e0102n8:143_0: 727. Iccassevaṁ paccayato ceva khaṇato ca dvedhā udayabbayaṁ passato paccayato udayadassanena
anya-e0102n8:143_1: samudayasaccaṁ pākaṭaṁ hoti janakāvabodhato. Khaṇato udayadassanena dukkhasaccaṁ
anya-e0102n8:143_2: pākaṭaṁ hoti jātidukkhāvabodhato. Paccayato vayadassanena nirodhasaccaṁ pākaṭaṁ hoti
anya-e0102n8:143_3: paccayānuppādena paccayavataṁ anuppādāvabodhato. Khaṇato vayadassanena dukkhasaccameva
anya-e0102n8:143_4: pākaṭaṁ hoti maraṇadukkhāvabodhato. Yañcassa udayabbayadassanaṁ, maggovāyaṁ lokikoti
anya-e0102n8:144_0: 728. Paccayato cassa udayadassanena anulomo paṭiccasamuppādo pākaṭo hoti, “imasmiṁ
anya-e0102n8:144_1: sati idaṁ hotī”ti avabodhato. Paccayato vayadassanena paṭilomo paṭiccasamuppādo pākaṭo
anya-e0102n8:144_2: hoti, “imassa nirodhā idaṁ nirujjhatī”ti avabodhato. Khaṇato pana udayabbayadassanena
anya-e0102n8:144_3: paṭiccasamuppannā dhammā pākaṭā honti saṅkhatalakkhaṇāvabodhato. Udayabbayavanto
anya-e0102n8:145_0: 729. Paccayato cassa udayadassanena ekattanayo pākaṭo hoti hetuphalasambandhena santānassa
anya-e0102n8:145_1: anupacchedāvabodhato. Atha suṭṭhutaraṁ ucchedadiṭṭhiṁ pajahati. Khaṇato udayadassanena
anya-e0102n8:145_2: nānattanayo pākaṭo hoti navanavānaṁ uppādāvabodhato. Atha suṭṭhutaraṁ sassatadiṭṭhiṁ
anya-e0102n8:145_3: pajahati. Paccayato cassa udayabbayadassanena abyāpāranayo pākaṭo hoti dhammānaṁ
anya-e0102n8:145_4: avasavattibhāvāvabodhato. Atha suṭṭhutaraṁ attadiṭṭhiṁ pajahati. Paccayato pana udayadassanena
anya-e0102n8:145_5: evaṁdhammatānayo pākaṭo hoti paccayānurūpena phalassa uppādāvabodhato. Atha suṭṭhutaraṁ
anya-e0102n8:146_0: 730. Paccayato cassa udayadassanena anattalakkhaṇaṁ pākaṭaṁ hoti dhammānaṁ nirīhakattapaccayapaṭibaddhavuttitāvabodhato.
anya-e0102n8:146_1: Khaṇato udayabbayadassanena aniccalakkhaṇaṁ pākaṭaṁ hoti hutvā abhāvāvabodhato, pubbantāparantavivekāvabodhato
anya-e0102n8:146_2: ca. Dukkhalakkhaṇampi pākaṭaṁ hoti udayabbayehi paṭipīḷanāvabodhato. Sabhāvalakkhaṇampi
anya-e0102n8:146_4: tāvakālikattampi pākaṭaṁ hoti udayakkhaṇe vayassa, vayakkhaṇe ca udayassa abhāvāvabodhatoti.
anya-e0102n8:147_1: dhammā anuppannapubbā uppajjanti, uppannā nirujjhantī”ti niccanavāva hutvā saṅkhārā
anya-e0102n8:147_2: upaṭṭhahanti. Na kevalañca niccanavā, sūriyuggamane ussāvabindu viya udakabubbuḷo
anya-e0102n8:147_3: viya udake daṇḍarāji viya āragge sāsapo viya vijjuppādo viya ca parittaṭṭhāyino.
anya-e0102n8:148_0: Ettāvatānena “vayadhammameva uppajjati, uppannañca vayaṁ upetī”ti iminā ākārena samapaññāsa
anya-e0102n8:148_1: lakkhaṇāni paṭivijjhitvā ṭhitaṁ udayabbayānupassanaṁ nāma taruṇavipassanāñāṇaṁ adhigataṁ
anya-e0102n8:150_0: 732. Athassa imāya taruṇavipassanāya āraddhavipassakassa dasa vipassanupakkilesā
anya-e0102n8:150_1: uppajjanti. Vipassanupakkilesā hi paṭivedhappattassa ariyasāvakassa ceva vippaṭipannakassa
anya-e0102n8:150_2: ca nikkhittakammaṭṭhānassa kusītapuggalassa nuppajjanti. Sammāpaṭipannakassa pana
anya-e0102n8:151: Katame pana te dasa upakkilesāti? Obhāso, ñāṇaṁ, pīti, passaddhi, sukhaṁ, adhimokkho, paggaho, upaṭṭhānaṁ, upekkhā, nikantīti. Vuttañhetaṁ –
anya-e0102n8:152_0: “Kathaṁ dhammuddhaccaviggahitamānasaṁ hoti? Aniccato manasikaroto obhāso uppajjati,
anya-e0102n8:152_1: ‘obhāso dhammo’ti obhāsaṁ āvajjati, tato vikkhepo uddhaccaṁ. Tena uddhaccena viggahitamānaso
anya-e0102n8:152_2: aniccato upaṭṭhānaṁ yathābhūtaṁ nappajānāti. Dukkhato… anattato upaṭṭhānaṁ yathābhūtaṁ nappajānāti”.
anya-e0102n8:153_0: Tathā “aniccato manasikaroto ñāṇaṁ uppajjati…pe… pīti… passaddhi… sukhaṁ… adhimokkho…
anya-e0102n8:153_1: paggaho… upaṭṭhānaṁ… upekkhā… nikanti uppajjati, ‘nikanti dhammo’ti nikantiṁ āvajjati,
anya-e0102n8:153_2: tato vikkhepo uddhaccaṁ. Tena uddhaccena viggahitamānaso aniccato upaṭṭhānaṁ yathābhūtaṁ
anya-e0102n8:153_3: nappajānāti. Dukkhato… anattato upaṭṭhānaṁ yathābhūtaṁ nappajānātī”ti.
anya-e0102n8:154_0: 733. Tattha obhāsoti vipassanobhāso. Tasmiṁ uppanne yogāvacaro “na vata me ito pubbe
anya-e0102n8:154_1: evarūpo obhāso uppannapubbo, addhā maggappattosmi phalapattosmī”ti amaggameva “maggo”ti,
anya-e0102n8:154_2: aphalameva ca “phala”nti gaṇhāti. Tassa amaggaṁ “maggo”ti aphalaṁ “phala”nti gaṇhato
anya-e0102n8:154_3: vipassanāvīthi ukkantā nāma hoti. So attano mūlakammaṭṭhānaṁ vissajjetvā obhāsameva assādento nisīdati.
anya-e0102n8:155_0: So kho panāyaṁ obhāso kassaci bhikkhuno pallaṅkaṭṭhānamattameva obhāsento uppajjati.
anya-e0102n8:155_1: Kassaci antogabbhaṁ. Kassaci bahigabbhampi. Kassaci sakalavihāraṁ, gāvutaṁ, aḍḍhayojanaṁ,
anya-e0102n8:155_2: yojanaṁ, dviyojanaṁ, tiyojanaṁ…pe… kassaci pathavītalato yāva akaniṭṭhabrahmalokā
anya-e0102n8:155_3: ekālokaṁ kurumāno. Bhagavato pana dasasahassilokadhātuṁ obhāsento udapādi.
anya-e0102n8:156_0: Evaṁ vemattatāya cassa idaṁ vatthu – cittalapabbate kira dvikuṭṭagehassa anto dve
anya-e0102n8:156_1: therā nisīdiṁsu. Taṁdivasañca kāḷapakkhuposatho hoti, meghapaṭalacchannā disā, rattibhāge
anya-e0102n8:156_2: caturaṅgasamannāgataṁ tamaṁ pavattati. Atheko thero āha – “bhante, mayhaṁ idāni cetiyaṅgaṇamhi
anya-e0102n8:156_3: sīhāsane pañcavaṇṇāni kusumāni paññāyantī”ti. Taṁ itaro āha – “anacchariyaṁ, āvuso,
anya-e0102n8:156_4: kathesi, mayhaṁ panetarahi mahāsamuddamhi yojanaṭṭhāne macchakacchapā paññāyantī”ti.
anya-e0102n8:157_0: Ayaṁ pana vipassanupakkileso yebhuyyena samathavipassanālābhino uppajjati. So samāpattivikkhambhitānaṁ
anya-e0102n8:157_1: kilesānaṁ asamudācārato “arahā aha”nti cittaṁ uppādeti uccavālikavāsī mahānāgatthero
anya-e0102n8:157_2: viya haṁkanakavāsī mahādattatthero viya cittalapabbate niṅkapeṇṇakapadhānagharavāsī
anya-e0102n8:158_0: Tatridaṁ ekavatthuparidīpanaṁ – talaṅgaravāsī dhammadinnatthero kira nāma eko pabhinnapaṭisambhido
anya-e0102n8:158_1: mahākhīṇāsavo mahato bhikkhusaṅghassa ovādadāyako ahosi. So ekadivasaṁ attano divāṭṭhāne
anya-e0102n8:158_2: nisīditvā “kinnu kho amhākaṁ ācariyassa uccavālikavāsīmahānāgattherassa samaṇabhāvakiccaṁ
anya-e0102n8:158_3: matthakaṁ pattaṁ, no”ti āvajjanto puthujjanabhāvamevassa disvā “mayi agacchante puthujjanakālakiriyameva
anya-e0102n8:158_4: karissatī”ti ca ñatvā iddhiyā vehāsaṁ uppatitvā divāṭṭhāne nisinnassa therassa samīpe
anya-e0102n8:158_5: orohitvā vanditvā vattaṁ dassetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. “Kiṁ, āvuso dhammadinna, akāle
anya-e0102n8:158_6: āgatosī”ti ca vutte “pañhaṁ, bhante, pucchituṁ āgatomhī”ti āha. Tato “pucchāvuso,
anya-e0102n8:159_0: Thero pucchitapucchitaṁ asajjamānova kathesi. Tato “atitikkhaṁ vo, bhante, ñāṇaṁ,
anya-e0102n8:159_1: kadā tumhehi ayaṁ dhammo adhigato”ti vutte “ito saṭṭhivassakāle, āvuso”ti āha. Samādhimpi,
anya-e0102n8:159_2: bhante, vaḷañjethāti, na yidaṁ, āvuso, bhāriyanti. Tena hi, bhante, ekaṁ hatthiṁ
anya-e0102n8:159_3: māpethāti. Thero sabbasetaṁ hatthiṁ māpesi. Idāni, bhante, yathā ayaṁ hatthī añcitakaṇṇo
anya-e0102n8:159_4: pasāritanaṅguṭṭho soṇḍaṁ mukhe pakkhipitvā bheravaṁ koñcanādaṁ karonto tumhākaṁ abhimukho
anya-e0102n8:159_5: āgacchati, tathā naṁ karothāti. Thero tathā katvā vegena āgacchato hatthissa bheravaṁ
anya-e0102n8:159_6: ākāraṁ disvā uṭṭhāya palāyituṁ āraddho. Tamenaṁ khīṇāsavatthero hatthaṁ pasāretvā
anya-e0102n8:159_7: cīvarakaṇṇe gahetvā “bhante, khīṇāsavassa sārajjaṁ nāma hotī”ti āha.
anya-e0102n8:160_0: So tamhi kāle attano puthujjanabhāvaṁ ñatvā “avassayo me, āvuso, dhammadinna hohī”ti
anya-e0102n8:160_1: vatvā pādamūle ukkuṭikaṁ nisīdi. “Bhante, tumhākaṁ avassayo bhavissāmiccevāhaṁ āgato,
anya-e0102n8:160_2: mā cintayitthā”ti kammaṭṭhānaṁ kathesi. Thero kammaṭṭhānaṁ gahetvā caṅkamaṁ āruyha
anya-e0102n8:160_3: tatiye padavāre aggaphalaṁ arahattaṁ pāpuṇi. Thero kira dosacarito ahosi. Evarūpā
anya-e0102n8:161: 734.Ñāṇanti vipassanāñāṇaṁ. Tassa kira rūpārūpadhamme tulayantassa tīrentassa vissaṭṭhaindavajiramiva avihatavegaṁ tikhiṇaṁ sūraṁ ativisadaṁ ñāṇaṁ uppajjati.
anya-e0102n8:162: Pītīti vipassanāpīti. Tassa kira tasmiṁ samaye khuddakāpīti, khaṇikāpīti, okkantikāpīti, ubbegāpīti, pharaṇāpītīti ayaṁ pañcavidhā pīti sakalasarīraṁ pūrayamānā uppajjati.
anya-e0102n8:163_0: Passaddhīti vipassanāpassaddhi. Tassa kira tasmiṁ samaye rattiṭṭhāne vā divāṭṭhāne
anya-e0102n8:163_1: vā nisinnassa kāyacittānaṁ neva daratho, na gāravaṁ, na kakkhaḷatā, na akammaññatā,
anya-e0102n8:163_2: na gelaññaṁ, na vaṅkatā hoti, atha kho panassa kāyacittāni passaddhāni lahūni mudūni
anya-e0102n8:163_3: kammaññāni suvisadāni ujukāniyeva honti. So imehi passaddhādīhi anuggahitakāyacitto
anya-e0102n8:163_4: tasmiṁ samaye amānusiṁ nāma ratiṁ anubhavati. Yaṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ –
anya-e0102n8:165: Amānusī rati hoti, sammā dhammaṁ vipassato.
anya-e0102n8:168: Evamassa imaṁ amānusiṁ ratiṁ sādhayamānā lahutādisampayuttā passaddhi uppajjati.
anya-e0102n8:169: Sukhanti vipassanāsukhaṁ. Tassa kira tasmiṁ samaye sakalasarīraṁ abhisandayamānaṁ atipaṇītaṁ sukhaṁ uppajjati.
anya-e0102n8:170: Adhimokkhoti saddhā. Vipassanāsampayuttāyeva hissa cittacetasikānaṁ atisayapasādabhūtā balavatī saddhā uppajjati.
anya-e0102n8:171: Paggahoti vīriyaṁ. Vipassanāsampayuttameva hissa asithilaṁ anaccāraddhaṁ supaggahitaṁ vīriyaṁ uppajjati.
anya-e0102n8:172_0: Upaṭṭhānanti sati. Vipassanāsampayuttāyeva hissa supaṭṭhitā supatiṭṭhitā nikhātā
anya-e0102n8:172_1: acalā pabbatarājasadisā sati uppajjati. So yaṁ yaṁ ṭhānaṁ āvajjati samannāharati
anya-e0102n8:172_2: manasikaroti paccavekkhati, taṁ taṁ ṭhānamassa okkhanditvā pakkhanditvā dibbacakkhuno
anya-e0102n8:173_0: Upekkhāti vipassanupekkhā ceva āvajjanupekkhā ca. Tasmiṁ hissa samaye sabbasaṅkhāresu
anya-e0102n8:173_1: majjhattabhūtā vipassanupekkhāpi balavatī uppajjati. Manodvāre āvajjanupekkhāpi.
anya-e0102n8:173_2: Sā hissa taṁ taṁ ṭhānaṁ āvajjantassa vissaṭṭhaindavajiramiva pattapuṭe pakkhitta
anya-e0102n8:173_3: tattanārāco viya ca sūrā tikhiṇā hutvā vahati.
anya-e0102n8:174: Nikantīti vipassanānikanti. Evaṁ obhāsādipaṭimaṇḍitāya hissa vipassanāya ālayaṁ kurumānā sukhumā santākārā nikanti uppajjati. Yā nikanti kilesoti pariggahetumpi na sakkā hoti.
anya-e0102n8:175_0: Yathā ca obhāse, evaṁ etesupi aññatarasmiṁ uppanne yogāvacaro “na vata me ito pubbe
anya-e0102n8:175_1: evarūpaṁ ñāṇaṁ uppannapubbaṁ, evarūpā pīti, passaddhi, sukhaṁ, adhimokkho, paggaho,
anya-e0102n8:175_2: upaṭṭhānaṁ, upekkhā, nikanti uppannapubbā, addhā maggappattosmi phalappattosmī”ti
anya-e0102n8:175_3: amaggameva “maggo”ti aphalameva ca “phala”nti gaṇhāti. Tassa amaggaṁ “maggo”ti aphalaṁ
anya-e0102n8:175_4: “phala”nti gaṇhato vipassanāvīthi ukkantā nāma hoti. So attano mūlakammaṭṭhānaṁ vissajjetvā
anya-e0102n8:176_0: 735. Ettha ca obhāsādayo upakkilesavatthutāya upakkilesāti vuttā, na akusalattā.
anya-e0102n8:176_1: Nikanti pana upakkileso ceva upakkilesavatthu ca. Vatthuvaseneva cete dasa. Gāhavasena
anya-e0102n8:176_2: pana samatiṁsa honti. Kathaṁ? “Mama obhāso uppanno”ti gaṇhato hi diṭṭhigāho hoti,
anya-e0102n8:176_3: “manāpo vata obhāso uppanno”ti gaṇhato mānagāho, obhāsaṁ assādayato taṇhāgāho, iti
anya-e0102n8:176_4: obhāse diṭṭhimānataṇhāvasena tayo gāhā. Tathā sesesupīti evaṁ gāhavasena samatiṁsa
anya-e0102n8:176_5: upakkilesā honti. Tesaṁ vasena akusalo abyatto yogāvacaro obhāsādīsu kampati vikkhipati.
anya-e0102n8:176_6: Obhāsādīsu ekekaṁ “etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā”ti samanupassati. Tenāhu porāṇā –
anya-e0102n8:177: “Obhāse ceva ñāṇe ca, pītiyā ca vikampati;
anya-e0102n8:178: Passaddhiyā sukhe ceva, yehi cittaṁ pavedhati.
anya-e0102n8:182_0: 736. Kusalo pana paṇḍito byatto buddhisampanno yogāvacaro obhāsādīsu uppannesu “ayaṁ
anya-e0102n8:182_1: kho me obhāso uppanno, so kho panāyaṁ anicco saṅkhato paṭiccasamuppanno khayadhammo
anya-e0102n8:182_2: vayadhammo virāgadhammo nirodhadhammo”ti iti vā taṁ paññāya paricchindati upaparikkhati.
anya-e0102n8:182_3: Atha vā panassa evaṁ hoti, “sace obhāso attā bhaveyya, ‘attā’ti gahetuṁ vaṭṭeyya.
anya-e0102n8:182_4: Anattā ca panāyaṁ ‘attā’ti gahito. Tasmā so avasavattanaṭṭhena anattā, hutvā abhāvaṭṭhena
anya-e0102n8:182_5: anicco, uppādavayapaṭipīḷanaṭṭhena dukkho”ti sabbaṁ arūpasattake vuttanayena vitthāretabbaṁ.
anya-e0102n8:183_0: So evaṁ upaparikkhitvā obhāsaṁ “netaṁ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā”ti samanupassati.
anya-e0102n8:183_1: Ñāṇaṁ…pe… nikantiṁ “netaṁ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā”ti samanupassati. Evaṁ
anya-e0102n8:183_2: samanupassanto obhāsādīsu na kampati na vedhati. Tenāhu porāṇā –
anya-e0102n8:185: Dhammuddhaccakusalo hoti, na ca vikkhepaṁ gacchatī”ti. ;
anya-e0102n8:186_0: So evaṁ vikkhepaṁ agacchanto taṁ samatiṁsavidhaṁ upakkilesajaṭaṁ vijaṭetvā obhāsādayo
anya-e0102n8:186_1: dhammā na maggo. Upakkilesavimuttaṁ pana vīthipaṭipannaṁ vipassanāñāṇaṁ maggoti maggañca
anya-e0102n8:186_2: amaggañca vavatthapeti. Tassevaṁ “ayaṁ maggo, ayaṁ na maggo”ti maggañca amaggañca
anya-e0102n8:187_0: Ettāvatā ca pana tena tiṇṇaṁ saccānaṁ vavatthānaṁ kataṁ hoti. Kathaṁ? Diṭṭhivisuddhiyaṁ
anya-e0102n8:187_1: tāva nāmarūpassa vavatthāpanena dukkhasaccassa vavatthānaṁ kataṁ. Kaṅkhāvitaraṇavisuddhiyaṁ
anya-e0102n8:187_3: sammāmaggassa avadhāraṇena maggasaccassa vavatthānaṁ katanti, evaṁ lokiyeneva tāva
anya-e0102n8:187_4: ñāṇena tiṇṇaṁ saccānaṁ vavatthānaṁ kataṁ hoti.
